Activator.CreateInstance(p.PropertyType) : null;Di2015NewLine            if (null != defaultVal && !val.Equals(defaultVal)) {Di2015NewLine                p.GetSetMethod().Invoke(to, new[] {val});Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19396837Di2015UniqueSeparator    private Size ContainerSizeForItem(ItemsControl itemsControl, object item, int index, out UIElement container)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Size containerSize;Di2015NewLine        container = index >= 0 ? ((ItemContainerGenerator)Generator).ContainerFromIndex(index) as UIElement : null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (container != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            containerSize = container.DesiredSize;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // It's virtualized; grab the height off the item if available.Di2015NewLine            object value = itemsControl.ReadItemValue(item, _desiredSizeStorageIndex);Di2015NewLine            if (value != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                containerSize = (Size)value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Di2015NewLine                // No stored container height; simply guess.Di2015NewLine                //Di2015NewLine                containerSize = new Size();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (Orientation == Orientation.Horizontal)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    containerSize.Width = ContainerStackingSizeEstimate(itemsControl, /*isHorizontal = */ true);Di2015NewLine                    containerSize.Height = DesiredSize.Height;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    containerSize.Height = ContainerStackingSizeEstimate(itemsControl, /*isHorizontal = */ false);Di2015NewLine                    containerSize.Width = DesiredSize.Width;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return containerSize;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private double ContainerStackingSizeEstimate(IProvideStackingSize estimate, bool isHorizontal)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double stackingSize = 0d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (estimate != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stackingSize = estimate.EstimatedContainerSize(isHorizontal);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (stackingSize <= 0d || DoubleUtil.IsNaN(stackingSize))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stackingSize = ScrollViewer._scrollLineDelta;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return stackingSize;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
19396837Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal const double _scrollLineDelta = 16.0;   // Default physical amount to scroll with one Up/DownDi2015NewLine

19398432Di2015UniqueSeparatorStack<FolderObject>
19398432Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<FolderObject> GetChildren(string repositoryId, string folderId)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<FolderObject> items = new List<FolderObject>();;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    QueryOperations query = new QueryOperations(GraphConnection);Di2015NewLine    var queryResult = query.GetChild(folderId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stack<FolderObject> folders = new Stack<FolderObject>(queryResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (folders.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FolderObject currentFolder = folders.Pop();Di2015NewLine        var childId = currentFolder.ObjectId;Di2015NewLine        items.Add(currentFolder);Di2015NewLine        var nextChildren = GetChildren(repositoryId, childId);Di2015NewLine        foreach (FolderObject child in nextChildren)Di2015NewLine            folders.Push(child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return items;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19400197Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TestsADi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class TestLambdaExpressionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        class Inner { public int tata; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string toto;Di2015NewLine        Inner tutu;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Test3<T>(Expression<Func<T>> exp)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression body = exp.Body;Di2015NewLine            List<string> memberNames = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            while(body.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MemberExpression memberBody = (MemberExpression)body;Di2015NewLine                memberNames.Add(memberBody.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine                body = memberBody.Expression;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            memberNames.Reverse();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Member: {0}", string.Join(".", memberNames));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Test()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TestLambdaExpression obj = new TestLambdaExpression();Di2015NewLine            obj.toto = "Hello world!";Di2015NewLine            obj.tutu = new Inner();Di2015NewLine            obj.tutu.tata = 42;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Test3(() => obj.toto);Di2015NewLine            Test3(() => obj.tutu.tata);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19400197Di2015UniqueSeparatorTestLambdaExpression.Test

19400197Di2015UniqueSeparator        static void Test3<T>(Expression<Func<T>> exp)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression body = exp.Body;Di2015NewLine            List<string> memberNames = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            MemberInfo previousMember = null;Di2015NewLine            while(body.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MemberExpression memberBody = (MemberExpression)body;Di2015NewLine                string memberName = memberBody.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine                //If it's the 'last' member, replace with typeDi2015NewLine                if(memberBody.Expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.Constant && previousMember != null)Di2015NewLine                    memberName = previousMember.DeclaringType.name;Di2015NewLine                memberNames.Add(memberName);Di2015NewLine                previousMember = memberBody.Member;Di2015NewLine                body = memberBody.Expression;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            memberNames.Reverse();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Member: {0}", string.Join(".", memberNames));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

       Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void Begin (SpriteSortMode sortMode, BlendState blendState, SamplerState samplerState, DepthStencilState depthStencilState, RasterizerState rasterizerState, Effect effect, Matrix transformMatrix)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_beginCalled)Di2015NewLine                    throw new InvalidOperationException("Begin cannot be called again until End has been successfully called.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // defaultsDi2015NewLine                _sortMode = sortMode;Di2015NewLine                _blendState = blendState ?? BlendState.AlphaBlend;Di2015NewLine                _samplerState = samplerState ?? SamplerState.LinearClamp;Di2015NewLine                _depthStencilState = depthStencilState ?? DepthStencilState.None;Di2015NewLine                _rasterizerState = rasterizerState ??   RasterizerState.CullCounterClockwise;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _effect = effect;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _matrix = transformMatrix;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Setup things now so a user can chage them.Di2015NewLine                if (sortMode == SpriteSortMode.Immediate)Di2015NewLine                    Setup();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _beginCalled = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void Begin (SpriteSortMode sortMode, BlendState blendState)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Begin (sortMode, blendState, SamplerState.LinearClamp, DepthStencilState.None, RasterizerState.CullCounterClockwise, null, Matrix.Identity);                        Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void End ()Di2015NewLine            {        Di2015NewLine                _beginCalled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (_sortMode != SpriteSortMode.Immediate)Di2015NewLine                        Setup();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#if PSM   Di2015NewLine        GraphicsDevice.BlendState = _blendState;Di2015NewLine        _blendState.ApplyState(GraphicsDevice);Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _batcher.DrawBatch(_sortMode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19410562Di2015UniqueSeparatorIPdfPCellEvent
19410562Di2015UniqueSeparatorIPdfPCellEvent
19410562Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ChildFieldEvent : IPdfPCellEvent {Di2015NewLine    /** A parent field to which a child field has to be added. */Di2015NewLine    protected PdfFormField parent;Di2015NewLine    /** The child field that has to be added */Di2015NewLine    protected PdfFormField kid;Di2015NewLine    /** The padding of the field inside the cell */Di2015NewLine    protected float padding;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * Creates a ChildFieldEvent.Di2015NewLine     * @param parent the parent fieldDi2015NewLine     * @param kid the child fieldDi2015NewLine     * @param padding a paddingDi2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    public ChildFieldEvent(PdfFormField parent, PdfFormField kid, float padding) {Di2015NewLine        this.parent = parent;Di2015NewLine        this.kid = kid;Di2015NewLine        this.padding = padding;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * Add the child field to the parent, and sets the coordinates of the child field.Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    public void CellLayout(PdfPCell cell, iTextSharp.text.Rectangle rect, PdfContentByte[] cb) {Di2015NewLine        parent.AddKid(kid);Di2015NewLine        kid.SetWidget(new iTextSharp.text.Rectangle(Di2015NewLine                                                    rect.GetLeft(padding),Di2015NewLine                                                    rect.GetBottom(padding),Di2015NewLine                                                    rect.GetRight(padding),Di2015NewLine                                                    rect.GetTop(padding)Di2015NewLine                                                    ),Di2015NewLine                                                    PdfAnnotation.HIGHLIGHT_INVERTDi2015NewLine                                                    );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19410562Di2015UniqueSeparatorCellEvent
19410562Di2015UniqueSeparator//File to createDi2015NewLinevar testFile = Path.Combine(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop), "test.pdf");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Standard PDF creation, nothing special hereDi2015NewLineusing (var fs = new FileStream(testFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None)) {Di2015NewLine    using (var doc = new Document()) {Di2015NewLine        using (var writer = PdfWriter.GetInstance(doc, fs)) {Di2015NewLine            doc.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create a root form object that we'll add "children" to. This way we don't have to add each "child" annotation to the writerDi2015NewLine            var root = PdfFormField.CreateEmpty(writer);Di2015NewLine            root.FieldName = "root";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create a two column tableDi2015NewLine            var t = new PdfPTable(2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Add a basic cellDi2015NewLine            t.AddCell("First Name");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create our textfield, the rectangle that we're passing in is ignored and doesn't matterDi2015NewLine            var tf = new TextField(writer, new iTextSharp.text.Rectangle(0, 0), "first-name");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create a new cellDi2015NewLine            var cell = new PdfPCell();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Set the cell event to our custom IPdfPCellEvent implementationDi2015NewLine            cell.CellEvent = new ChildFieldEvent(root, tf.GetTextField(), 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Add the cell to our tableDi2015NewLine            t.AddCell(cell);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Add the table to the documentDi2015NewLine            doc.Add(t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //IMPORTANT! Add the root annotation to the writer which also adds all of the child annotationsDi2015NewLine            writer.AddAnnotation(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Clean upDi2015NewLine            doc.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19412679Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Use a class instead of a struct to store your data in most cases... see linkDi2015NewLine    public class StudentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string forename { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string surname { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string prog_title { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string prog_code { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int id_number { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public float averageGrade { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //I ommited the defualt {} constructor so this is your only choice to create a new classDi2015NewLine        //you may want to choose to put it back in for more flexibility...see linkDi2015NewLine        public Student(string fname, string surname, string prog_title, string prog_code, int id_number)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            forename = fname;Di2015NewLine            this.surname = surname;Di2015NewLine            this.prog_title = prog_title;Di2015NewLine            this.prog_code = prog_code;Di2015NewLine            this.id_number = id_number;Di2015NewLine            averageGrade = 0.0F;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class module_dataDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string module_code { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string module_title { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int module_mark { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public module_data(string mcode, string mname, int score)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            module_code = mcode;Di2015NewLine            module_title = mname;Di2015NewLine            module_mark = score;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //I'm initializing the array using object initialization syntax ... see linkDi2015NewLine        Student[] students = new Student[4]Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                new Student( "Mark", "Anderson", "Comp", "CIS2117", 0),Di2015NewLine                 new Student( "Tom", "Jones", "Comp", "CIS2117", 1),Di2015NewLine                 new Student ("Tim", "Jones", "Comp", "CIS2117", 2),Di2015NewLine                 new Student( "Tim", "Bones", "Comp", "CIS2117", 3)Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        module_data[] modules = new module_data[4]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new module_data( "7", "App Dev", 0),Di2015NewLine            new module_data( "7", "App Dev", 1),Di2015NewLine            new module_data("7", "App Dev", 2),Di2015NewLine            new module_data("7", "App Dev", 3)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        printAllStudent(students);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Because an array implements IEnumerable you should use a foreach loop instead of a for loopDi2015NewLine    static void printAllStudent(Student[] students)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Student 19413847Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Tuple<Expression, Type> GetSelector<T>(IEnumerable<string> propertyNames)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    Expression body = parameter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var property in propertyNames)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        body = Expression.Property(body,Di2015NewLine            body.Type.GetProperty(property));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Tuple.Create(Expression.Lambda(body, parameter) as ExpressionDi2015NewLine        , body.Type);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19413847Di2015UniqueSeparatorMakeGenericMethod
19413847Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Func<IQueryable<T>, IOrderedQueryable<T>> GetOrderByFunc<T>(Di2015NewLine    this Tuple<IEnumerable<string>, SortingType> sortCriteria)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var selector = GetSelector<T>(sortCriteria.Item1);Di2015NewLine    Type[] argumentTypes = new[] { typeof(T), selector.Item2 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var orderByMethod = typeof(Queryable).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine        .First(method => method.Name == "OrderBy"Di2015NewLine            && method.GetParameters().Count() == 2)Di2015NewLine            .MakeGenericMethod(argumentTypes);Di2015NewLine    var orderByDescMethod = typeof(Queryable).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine        .First(method => method.Name == "OrderByDescending"Di2015NewLine            && method.GetParameters().Count() == 2)Di2015NewLine            .MakeGenericMethod(argumentTypes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (sortCriteria.Item2 == SortingType.Descending)Di2015NewLine        return query => (IOrderedQueryable<T>)Di2015NewLine            orderByDescMethod.Invoke(null, new object[] { query, selector.Item1 });Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return query => (IOrderedQueryable<T>)Di2015NewLine            orderByMethod.Invoke(null, new object[] { query, selector.Item1 });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19423566Di2015UniqueSeparator//serverDi2015NewLinevar stream = c.GetStream();Di2015NewLinevar reader = new BinaryReader(c.GetStream());Di2015NewLineFileInfo fileInfoToWrite = new FileInfo(path);Di2015NewLinelong fileSize = reader.ReadInt64();Di2015NewLineusing (FileStream fileStream = fileInfoToWrite.Create()) Di2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    int read = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (long i = 0; i < fileSize; i += (long)read)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine       read = stream.Read(buffer, 0, Math.Min(fileSize - i, 1024));Di2015NewLine       if (read == 0)Di2015NewLine          return;//client disconnected!(or throw Exception)Di2015NewLine       fileStream.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19423572Di2015UniqueSeparator<(?!/?(?:strong|em|i|u|b))[^>]+>Di2015NewLine
19423572Di2015UniqueSeparatorRemove Other TagsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<(?!/?(?:strong|em|i|u|b))[^>]+>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineMatch the character <? literally <Di2015NewLineAssert that it is impossible to match the regex below starting at this position (negative lookahead) (?!/?(?:strong|em|i|u|b))Di2015NewLine   Match the character /? literally /?Di2015NewLine      Between zero and one times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) ?Di2015NewLine   Match the regular expression below (?:strong|em|i|u|b)Di2015NewLine      Match either the regular expression below (attempting the next alternative only if this one fails) strongDi2015NewLine         Match the characters strong? literally strongDi2015NewLine      Or match regular expression number 2 below (attempting the next alternative only if this one fails) emDi2015NewLine         Match the characters em? literally emDi2015NewLine      Or match regular expression number 3 below (attempting the next alternative only if this one fails) iDi2015NewLine         Match the character i? literally iDi2015NewLine      Or match regular expression number 4 below (attempting the next alternative only if this one fails) uDi2015NewLine         Match the character u? literally uDi2015NewLine      Or match regular expression number 5 below (the entire group fails if this one fails to match) bDi2015NewLine         Match the character b? literally bDi2015NewLineMatch any character that is NOT a >? [^>]+Di2015NewLine   Between one and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) +Di2015NewLineMatch the character >? literally >Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCreated with RegexBuddyDi2015NewLine

19429945Di2015UniqueSeparatorSleep.For()
19429945Di2015UniqueSeparatorEvent
19429945Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing Common.FluentValidation;Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Common.EnvironmentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static partial class SleepDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Block the current thread for a specified amount of time.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="p_milliseconds">Time to block for.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="p_cancelToken">External token for waking thread early.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>True if sleeping was cancelled before timer expired.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static bool For(int p_milliseconds, CancellationToken p_cancelToken = default(CancellationToken))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Used as "No-Op" during debugDi2015NewLine            if (p_milliseconds == 0)Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // ValidateDi2015NewLine            p_millisecondsDi2015NewLine                .MustBeEqualOrAbove(0, "p_milliseconds");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Merge Tokens and block on eitherDi2015NewLine            CancellationToken LocalToken = new CancellationToken();Di2015NewLine            using (var SleeperSource = CancellationTokenSource.CreateLinkedTokenSource(LocalToken, p_cancelToken))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SleeperSourceDi2015NewLine                    .TokenDi2015NewLine                    .WaitHandleDi2015NewLine                    .WaitOne(p_milliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return SleeperSource.IsCancellationRequested;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19429945Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing Performance.CPU_Percent_Load(),Di2015NewLine            //        Performance.PrivateMemorySize64(),Di2015NewLine            //        Performance.ThreadCount(),Di2015NewLine            // 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Action RunMethod;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Program Started...\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            var MainScope_cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine                GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLine                GC.Collect();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var LoopScope_cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Enter number of Sleep.For() iterations:");Di2015NewLine                    var Loops = int.Parse(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Enter millisecond interval per iteration:");Di2015NewLine                    var Rate = int.Parse(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    RunMethod = () => SomeMethod(Loops, Rate, MainScope_cts.Token);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    RunMethod();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("\\r\\nPress any key to try again, or press Escape to exit.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (Console.ReadKey().Key != ConsoleKey.Escape);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\r\\nProgram Ended...");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void SomeMethod(int p_loops, int p_rate, CancellationToken p_token)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var local_cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Method Executing " + p_loops + " Loops at " + p_rate + "ms each.\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < p_loops; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var Handles = Performance.HandleCount();Di2015NewLine                Sleep.For(p_rate, p_token); /*<--- Change token here to test GC and variable Scoping*/Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("H_pre " + Handles + ", H_post " + Performance.HandleCount());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

[DllImport("User32")]Di2015NewLine        extern public static int GetGuiResources(IntPtr hProcess, int uiFlags);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static int GDI_Objects_Count()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Return the count of GDI objects.Di2015NewLine            return GetGuiResources(System.Diagnostics.Process.GetCurrentProcess().Handle, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static int USER_Objects_Count()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Return the count of USER objects.Di2015NewLine            return GetGuiResources(System.Diagnostics.Process.GetCurrentProcess().Handle, 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static string CPU_Percent_Load()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //http://allen-conway-dotnet.blogspot.ca/2013/07/get-cpu-usage-across-all-cores-in-c.htmlDi2015NewLine            //Get CPU usage values using a WMI queryDi2015NewLine            ManagementObjectSearcher searcher = new ManagementObjectSearcher("SELECT * FROM Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor");Di2015NewLine            var cpuTimes = searcher.Get()Di2015NewLine                .Cast<ManagementObject>()Di2015NewLine                .Select(mo =>Di2015NewLine                    newDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Name = mo["Name"],Di2015NewLine                        Usage = mo["PercentProcessorTime"]Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                ).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var Total = cpuTimes[cpuTimes.Count - 1];Di2015NewLine            cpuTimes.RemoveAt(cpuTimes.Count - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var PercentUsage = string.Join("_", cpuTimes.Select(x => Convert.ToInt32(x.Usage).ToString("00")));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return PercentUsage + "," + Convert.ToInt32(Total.Usage).ToString("00");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static long PrivateMemorySize64()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var P = Process.GetCurrentProcess())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 19429957Di2015UniqueSeparator    public float end_time = 10.0f;Di2015NewLine    public float start_time;Di2015NewLine    private float running_time;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use this for initializationDi2015NewLine    void Start () Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        start_time = Time.deltaTime;Di2015NewLine        running_time = 0f;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Update is called once per frameDi2015NewLine    void Update () Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EyeTarget();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void EyeTarget()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RaycastHit hit;Di2015NewLine        Vector3 fwd = transform.TransformDirection(Vector3.forward);Di2015NewLine        if (Physics.Raycast(transform.position, fwd, out hit))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine         //  Debug.Log("ray hit (tag): " + hit.collider.gameObject.tag + " : ");Di2015NewLine            if(hit.collider.gameObject.tag == "floor")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Debug.Log("Just hit the floor");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                start_time = Time.time - end_time;Di2015NewLine                running_time += Time.deltaTimeDi2015NewLine                //if(start_time <= 0)Di2015NewLine                if ( running_time >= end_time )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Debug.Log("looked at floor for 10 seconds");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( hit.collider.gameObject.tag != "floor")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ResetTimer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Debug.DrawRay(transform.position, fwd, Color.green);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void ResetTimer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        start_time = Time.time;Di2015NewLine        running_time = 0f;Di2015NewLine        Debug.Log("resetting timer");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19431191Di2015UniqueSeparator    internal List<GroupInfoList<object>> GetGroupsByLetter() Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        List<GroupInfoList<object>> groups = new List<GroupInfoList<object>>(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var query = from item in Collection Di2015NewLine                    orderby ((Item)item).Title Di2015NewLine                    group item by ((Item)item).Title[0] into g Di2015NewLine                    select new { GroupName = g.Key, Items = g }; Di2015NewLine        foreach (var g in query) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            GroupInfoList<object> info = new GroupInfoList<object>(); Di2015NewLine            info.Key = g.GroupName; Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in g.Items) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                info.Add(item); Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            groups.Add(info); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return groups; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

19431213Di2015UniqueSeparator/^(([A-Z])(?!.*\\2)[0-9])+$/gDi2015NewLine
19431213Di2015UniqueSeparator/^          # Start regex, and pattern matchDi2015NewLine(           # Start group 1Di2015NewLine([A-Z])     # Capture any character from A-Z into group 2Di2015NewLine(?!.*\\2)    # Do negative lookahead `(?!...)` to ensure there is no repeat of the captured group 2 (`\\2`), after zero or more of anything (`.*`)Di2015NewLine[0-9]       # Capture a digitDi2015NewLine)+          # End group 1Di2015NewLine$/g         # End regex, and pattern match, with global flag setDi2015NewLine

19431572Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Factory<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Factory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _Mappings = new Dictionary<string,Func<IInterface<T>>>(2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _Mappings.Add("MyClass1", () => new MyClass1() as IInterface<T>);Di2015NewLine        _Mappings.Add("MyClass2", () => new MyClass2() as IInterface<T>);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public IInterface<T> Get(string typeName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Func<IInterface<T>> func;Di2015NewLine        if (_Mappings.TryGetValue(typeName, out func))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return func();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    readonly Dictionary<string, Func<IInterface<T>>> _Mappings;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyClass1 : IInterface<int>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Method()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyClass2 : IInterface<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Method()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IInterface<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T Method();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19431767Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic async Task<bool> Init()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var series = Enumerable.Range(1, 5).ToList();Di2015NewLine    var tasks = new List<Task<Tuple<int, bool>>>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var i in series)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Starting Process {0}", i);Di2015NewLine        tasks.Add(DoWorkAsync(i));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (var task in await Task.WhenAll(tasks))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (task.Item2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Ending Process {0}", task.Item1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic async Task<Tuple<int, bool>> DoWorkAsync(int i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("working..{0}", i);Di2015NewLine    await Task.Delay(1000);Di2015NewLine    return Tuple.Create(i, true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19433204Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static ProjectItem FindProjectItemInProject(Project project, string name, bool recursive)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ProjectItem projectItem = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (project.Kind != Constants.vsProjectKindSolutionItems)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (project.ProjectItems != null && project.ProjectItems.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            projectItem = DteHelper.FindItemByName(project.ProjectItems, name, recursive);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if solution folder, one of its ProjectItems might be a real projectDi2015NewLine        foreach (ProjectItem item in project.ProjectItems)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Project realProject = item.Object as Project;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (realProject != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                projectItem = FindProjectItemInProject(realProject, name, recursive);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (projectItem != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return projectItem;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19434133Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T1, T3>> Combine<T1, T2, T3>(Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T1, T2>> first,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T2, T3>> second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T1), "param");Di2015NewLine    var body = Expression.Invoke(second, Expression.Invoke(first, param));Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T1, T3>>(body, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19434133Di2015UniqueSeparatorReplaceVisitor
19434133Di2015UniqueSeparatorReplaceVisitor
19434133Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ReplaceVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public ReplaceVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19434133Di2015UniqueSeparatorCombine
19434133Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T1, T3>> Combine<T1, T2, T3>(Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T1, T2>> first,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T2, T3>> second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T1), "param");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var newFirst = new ReplaceVisitor(first.Parameters.First(), param)Di2015NewLine        .Visit(first.Body);Di2015NewLine    var newSecond = new ReplaceVisitor(second.Parameters.First(), newFirst)Di2015NewLine        .Visit(second.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T1, T3>>(newSecond, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19434439Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<sampleWithIntervals> groups = new List<sampleWithIntervals>();  Di2015NewLinesampleWithIntervals curGroup = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(sample s in samples.OrderBy(sa => sa.content).ThenBy(sa => sa.Date))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(curGroup == null || // first groupDi2015NewLine        s.Date != curGroup.endDate.AddDays(1) ||Di2015NewLine        s.content != curGroup.content   // new groupDi2015NewLine      ) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        curGroup = new sampleWithIntervals() {startDate = s.Date, endDate = s.Date, content = s.content};Di2015NewLine        groups.Add(curGroup);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // add to current groupDi2015NewLine        curGroup.endDate = s.Date;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19434439Di2015UniqueSeparatorsamples.OrderBy(s => s.content)   Di2015NewLine       .ThenBy(s => s.Date)Di2015NewLine       // select each item with its indexDi2015NewLine       .Select ((s, i) => new {sample = s, index = i})  Di2015NewLine       // group by date miuns index to group consecutive itemsDi2015NewLine       .GroupBy(si => new {date = si.sample.Date.AddDays(-si.index), content = si.sample.content})  Di2015NewLine       // get the min, max, and content of each groupDi2015NewLine       .Select(g => new sampleWithIntervals() {Di2015NewLine                        startDate = g.Min(s => s.sample.Date), Di2015NewLine                        endDate = g.Max(s => s.sample.Date), Di2015NewLine                        content = g.First().sample.contentDi2015NewLine                        })Di2015NewLine

19437318Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void bw_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BackgroundWorker worker = sender as BackgroundWorker;Di2015NewLine        DoUIWorkHandler DoReadClick;Di2015NewLine        DoUIWorkHandler DoWriteClick;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int CurrentControlCount = 1;Di2015NewLine        string StatusText = "";Di2015NewLine        int ProgressValue = 0;Di2015NewLine        ReadAllArguments arguments = e.Argument as ReadAllArguments;Di2015NewLine        if (this != arguments.ListForm)Di2015NewLine          return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (arguments.Read)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            DoReadClick = c.btnRead.PerformClick;Di2015NewLine                            c.Invoke(DoReadClick);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            DoWriteClick = c.btnWrite.PerformClick;Di2015NewLine                            c.Invoke(DoWriteClick);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine       ...Di2015NewLine
19437318Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class ListForm: FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Background Worker Thread for Read / Write All tasksDi2015NewLine    private static BackgroundWorker bw = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static ListForm()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //We move the do-work out of the instance constructor, because the work that has to be done, is not connected to our instances. So we've only one definition of our work that has to be doneDi2015NewLine        bw.DoWork += new DoWorkEventHandler(TheWorkThatHasToBeDone);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ListForm()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             // Configure the Background Worker that reads and writes all variable dataDi2015NewLine             bw.WorkerReportsProgress = true;Di2015NewLine             bw.WorkerSupportsCancellation = true;Di2015NewLine             //no more registering on instance level Di2015NewLine             bw.ProgressChanged += new ProgressChangedEventHandler(bw_ProgressChanged);Di2015NewLine             bw.RunWorkerCompleted += new RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler(bw_RunWorkerCompleted);    Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Your new instance-independent doWork-Method - static hereDi2015NewLine    private static void TheWorkThatHasToBeDone(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BackgroundWorker worker = sender as BackgroundWorker;Di2015NewLine        ReadAllArguments arguments = e.Argument as ReadAllArguments;Di2015NewLine        //You call the instance-Method here for your specific instance you want the work to be done forDi2015NewLine        arguments.ListForm.bw_DoWork(worker, arguments);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Your old bw_DoWork-Method with nicer arguments - you should change the method name...Di2015NewLine    private void bw_DoWork(BackgroundWorker worker, ReadAllArguments arguments)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DoUIWorkHandler DoReadClick;Di2015NewLine            DoUIWorkHandler DoWriteClick;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int CurrentControlCount = 1;Di2015NewLine            string StatusText = "";Di2015NewLine            int ProgressValue = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // *******************Perform a time consuming operation and report progress. 19438001Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string CreatePasswordDigest(byte[] nonce, string createdTime, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // combine three byte arrays into oneDi2015NewLine    byte[] time = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(createdTime);Di2015NewLine    byte[] pwd = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(password);Di2015NewLine    byte[] operand = new byte[nonce.Length + time.Length + pwd.Length];Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(nonce, operand, nonce.Length);Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(time, 0, operand, nonce.Length, time.Length);Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(pwd, 0, operand, nonce.Length + time.Length, pwd.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create the hashDi2015NewLine    var sha1Hasher = new SHA1CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    byte[] hashedDataBytes = sha1Hasher.ComputeHash(operand);Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(hashedDataBytes);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCreatePasswordDigest(Convert.FromBase64String("UIYifr1SPoNlrmmKGSVOug=="), "2009-12-03T16:14:49Z", "test8")Di2015NewLine
19438001Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate byte[] CreateNonce()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var Rand = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    //make random octetsDi2015NewLine    byte[] buf = new byte[0x10];Di2015NewLine    Rand.GetBytes(buf);Di2015NewLine    return buf;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19440184Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AlarmTests : ReactiveTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Test]Di2015NewLine    public void MultipleKeyMultipleSignalMultipleLevelTest()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var threshold1 = TimeSpan.FromTicks(300);Di2015NewLine        var threshold2 = TimeSpan.FromTicks(800);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var scheduler = new TestScheduler();Di2015NewLine        var signals = scheduler.CreateHotObservable(Di2015NewLine            OnNext(200, 1),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(200, 2),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(400, 1),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(420, 2),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(800, 1),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(1000, 1),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(1200, 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine threshold1;Di2015NewLine            if (level == 2) return threshold2;Di2015NewLine            return TimeSpan.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = scheduler.CreateObserver<Alarm<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        signals.AlarmSystem(Di2015NewLine            keySelector,Di2015NewLine            thresholdSelector,Di2015NewLine            2,Di2015NewLine            scheduler).Subscribe(results);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        scheduler.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        results.Messages.AssertEqual(Di2015NewLine            OnNext(700, new Alarm<int>(1, 1)),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(720, new Alarm<int>(2, 1)),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(1220, new Alarm<int>(2, 2)),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(1500, new Alarm<int>(1, 1)),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(2000, new Alarm<int>(1, 2)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [Test]Di2015NewLine    public void CheckAlarmIsSuppressed()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var threshold1 = TimeSpan.FromTicks(300);Di2015NewLine        var threshold2 = TimeSpan.FromTicks(500);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var scheduler = new 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<int, int> keySelector = i => i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<int, int, TimeSpan> thresholdSelector = (signal, level) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (level == 1) return threshold1;Di2015NewLine            if (level == 2) return threshold2;Di2015NewLine            return TimeSpan.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = scheduler.CreateObserver<Alarm<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        signals.AlarmSystem(Di2015NewLine            keySelector,Di2015NewLine            thresholdSelector,Di2015NewLine            2,Di2015NewLine            scheduler).Subscribe(results);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        scheduler.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        results.Messages.AssertEqual(Di2015NewLine            OnNext(900, new Alarm<int>(1, 1)),Di2015NewLine            OnNext(1100, new Alarm<int>(1, 2)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ObservableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Create an alarm system that detects signal gaps of lengthDi2015NewLine    /// determined by a signal key and signals alarms of increasing severity.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TSignal">Type of the signal</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TKey">Type of the signal key used for grouping, must implement Equals correctly</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="signals">Input signal stream</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="keySelector">Function to select a key from a signal for grouping</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="thresholdSelector">Function to select a threshold for a given signal key and alarm level.Di2015NewLine    /// Should return TimeSpan.MaxValue for levels above the highest level</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="levels">Number of alarm levels</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="scheduler">Scheduler use for throttling</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A stream of alarms each of which contains the signal and alarm level</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static IObservable<Alarm<TSignal>> AlarmSystem<TSignal, TKey>(Di2015NewLine        this IObservable<TSignal> signals,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSignal, TKey> keySelector,Di2015NewLine        Func<TKey, int, TimeSpan> thresholdSelector,Di2015NewLine        int levels,Di2015NewLine        IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var alarmSignals = signals.Select(signal => new Alarm<TSignal>(signal, 0))Di2015NewLine                                  .Publish()Di2015NewLine                                  .RefCount();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < levels; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            alarmSignals = alarmSignals.CreateAlarmSystemLevel(Di2015NewLine                keySelector, thresholdSelector, i + 1, scheduler);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return alarmSignals.Where(alarm => alarm.Level != 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IObservable<Alarm<TSignal>> CreateAlarmSystemLevel<TSignal, TKey>(Di2015NewLine        this IObservable<Alarm<TSignal>> alarmSignals,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSignal, TKey> keySelector,Di2015NewLine        Func<TKey, int, TimeSpan> thresholdSelector,Di2015NewLine        int level,Di2015NewLine        IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return alarmSignalsDi2015NewLine            .Where(alarmSignal => alarmSignal.Level == 0)Di2015NewLine            .Select(alarmSignal => alarmSignal.Signal)Di2015NewLine            .GroupByUntil(Di2015NewLine                keySelector,Di2015NewLine                grp => grp.Throttle(thresholdSelector(grp.Key, level), scheduler))Di2015NewLine            .SelectMany(grp => grp.TakeLast(1).Select(signal => new Alarm<TSignal>(signal, level)))Di2015NewLine            .Merge(alarmSignals);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Alarm<TSignal> : IEquatable<Alarm<TSignal>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Alarm(TSignal signal, int level)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Signal = signal;Di2015NewLine        Level = level;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TSignal Signal { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Level { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool Equals(Alarm<TSignal> x, Alarm<TSignal> y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(x, null))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(y, null))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(x, y))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return x.Signal.Equals(y.Signal) && x.Level.Equals(y.Level);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Equality implementation added to help with testing.Di2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Equals(this, other as Alarm<TSignal>);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("Signal: {0} Level: {1}", Signal, Level);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Alarm<TSignal> other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Equals(this, other);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator ==(Alarm<TSignal> x, Alarm<TSignal> y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Equals(x, y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator !=(Alarm<TSignal> x, Alarm<TSignal> y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !Equals(x, y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ((Signal.GetHashCode()*37) ^ Level.GetHashCode()*329);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string value = "@arifansari300<3>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string encryptedValue= EncryptDecrypt.Encrypt(value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string decryptedValue = EncryptDecrypt.Decrypt(encryptedValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Encrypt(string clearText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string EncryptionKey = "MAKV2SPBNI99212";Di2015NewLine        byte[] clearBytes = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(clearText);Di2015NewLine        using (Aes encryptor = Aes.Create())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Rfc2898DeriveBytes pdb = new Di2015NewLine                Rfc2898DeriveBytes(EncryptionKey, new byte[] Di2015NewLine                { 0x49, 0x76, 0x61, 0x6e, 0x20, 0x4d, 0x65, 0x64, 0x76, 0x65, 0x64, 0x65, 0x76 });Di2015NewLine            encryptor.Key = pdb.GetBytes(32);Di2015NewLine            encryptor.IV = pdb.GetBytes(16);Di2015NewLine            using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (CryptoStream cs = new CryptoStream(ms, encryptor.CreateEncryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    cs.Write(clearBytes, 0, clearBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                    cs.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                clearText = Convert.ToBase64String(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return clearText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Decrypt(string cipherText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string EncryptionKey = "MAKV2SPBNI99212";Di2015NewLine        byte[] cipherBytes = Convert.FromBase64String(cipherText);Di2015NewLine        using (Aes encryptor = Aes.Create())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Rfc2898DeriveBytes pdb = new Di2015NewLine                Rfc2898DeriveBytes(EncryptionKey, new byte[] Di2015NewLine                { 0x49, 0x76, 0x61, 0x6e, 0x20, 0x4d, 0x65, 0x64, 0x76, 0x65, 0x64, 0x65, 0x76 });Di2015NewLine            encryptor.Key = pdb.GetBytes(32);Di2015NewLine            encryptor.IV = pdb.GetBytes(16);Di2015NewLine            using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (CryptoStream cs = new CryptoStream(ms, encryptor.CreateDecryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    cs.Write(cipherBytes, 0, cipherBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                    cs.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                cipherText = Encoding.Unicode.GetString(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return cipherText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatorP(win on 0th tick) + P(win on 1st tick) + ... + P(win on 10th tick)Di2015NewLine
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatorP(win on 0th tick) = p(0)Di2015NewLineP(win on 1st tick) = (1-p(0)) * p(1)Di2015NewLineP(win on 2nd tick) = (1-p(0)) * (1-p(1)) * p(2)Di2015NewLine
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparator 0       0Di2015NewLine 1  0.0068Di2015NewLine 2  0.0113Di2015NewLine 3  0.0188Di2015NewLine 4  0.0314Di2015NewLine 5  0.0524Di2015NewLine 6  0.0875Di2015NewLine 7  0.1459Di2015NewLine 8  0.2433Di2015NewLine 9  0.4059Di2015NewLine10  0.6771Di2015NewLine
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatorQ
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatorP(Win on 0th tick) + ... + P(Win on 10th tick) = QDi2015NewLine
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatori
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatori
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatorP(Win on ith tick) = const * iDi2015NewLine
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparator   c * 0 + c * 1 + c * 2 + ... + c * 10 = QDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine=> 55 * c = QDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine=> c = Q/55Di2015NewLine
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatorP(Win on 0th tick) = 0Di2015NewLineP(Win on 1st tick) = Q/55Di2015NewLineP(Win on 2nd tick) = 2*Q/55Di2015NewLine
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatorp(i)
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatorp(0) = P(win on 0th tick) = 0Di2015NewLinep(1) = P(win on 1st tick) / (1-p(0)) = Q/55Di2015NewLinep(2) = P(win on 2nd tick) / (1-p(0)) / (1-p(1)) = 2*(Q/55) / (1-Q/55)Di2015NewLine
19444232Di2015UniqueSeparatorN = 10;Di2015NewLineQ = 0.9;Di2015NewLinep = zeros(N+1,1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor i = 1:NDi2015NewLine  p(i+1) = i * Q/(0.5*N*(N+1)) / prod(1-p(1:i));Di2015NewLineendDi2015NewLine

19449052Di2015UniqueSeparatorcreate or replace function in_list( p_string in varchar2 ) return TableOfNumber asDi2015NewLine  l_string        long default p_string || ',';Di2015NewLine  l_data          TableOfNumber := TableOfNumber();Di2015NewLine  n               number;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  loopDi2015NewLine    exit when l_string is null;Di2015NewLine    n := instr( l_string, ',' );Di2015NewLine    l_data.extend;Di2015NewLine    l_data(l_data.count) := to_number( substr( l_string, 1, n-1 ) );Di2015NewLine    l_string := substr( l_string, n+1 );Di2015NewLine  end loop;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return l_data;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine

19452273Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupWhile<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<T> list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (predicate(previous, iterator.Current))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                list.Add(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return list;Di2015NewLine                list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19458566Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace MyNamespace.EventsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class EventDriver : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region Supporting EventsDi2015NewLine        public List<EventResponse> FireEvent(String EventName, Event Event)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<EventResponse> ResponseList = new List<EventResponse>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Type LocalType = this.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Type TargetType = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((TargetType = this.FindEventType(LocalType, EventName)) == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return ResponseList;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FieldInfo TargetField = TargetType.GetField(EventName, BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                MulticastDelegate EventDelegates = (MulticastDelegate) TargetField.GetValue(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (EventDelegates == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return ResponseList;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (Delegate TargetDelegate in EventDelegates.GetInvocationList())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        tryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Object DelegateResponse = TargetDelegate.DynamicInvoke(new Object[] { Event });Di2015NewLine                            EventResponse Response = (EventResponse)DelegateResponse;Di2015NewLine                            ResponseList.Add(Response);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return ResponseList;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private Type FindEventType(Type RootType, String EventName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (RootType == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(EventName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FieldInfo EventField = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (FieldInfo Method in RootType.GetFields(BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Public))Di2015NewLine                    if (Method.Name == EventName)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        EventField = Method;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (EventField == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (RootType.BaseType == null)Di2015NewLine                        return null;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        return this.FindEventType(RootType.BaseType, EventName);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return RootType;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region DispoabilityDi2015NewLine        public virtual void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.FireEvent("OnDispose", new Event(this, "Object is being disposed."));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing public class EventDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region EventsDi2015NewLine        public event EventHandler OnResponseFailure = null;Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region FieldsDi2015NewLine        public Object EventSource = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DateTime EventTime = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public String {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return this._EventStackTrace;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected List<EventResponse> _EventResponses = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public List<EventResponse> EventResponsesDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                List<EventResponse> EventResponses = new List<EventResponse>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                lock (this._EventResponses)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (EventResponse Response in this._EventResponses)Di2015NewLine                        EventResponses.Add(Response);Di2015NewLine 19459261Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate byte[] DownloadFile( string uri, int requestTimeout, int downloadTimeout, out bool isTimeout, out int bytesDownloaded )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = WebRequest.Create( uri ) as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine    request.Timeout = requestTimeout;Di2015NewLine    HttpWebResponse response = null;Di2015NewLine    Stream responseStream = null;Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream downloadedData = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] result = null;Di2015NewLine    bytesDownloaded = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    isTimeout = false;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get responseDi2015NewLine        response = request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse;Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[ 16384 ];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create buffer for downloaded dataDi2015NewLine        downloadedData = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the timeoutDi2015NewLine        DateTime timeout = DateTime.Now.Add( new TimeSpan( 0, 0, 0, 0, downloadTimeout ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Read parts of the streamDi2015NewLine        responseStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        int bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine        DateTime now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        while ( (bytesRead = responseStream.Read( buffer, 0, buffer.Length )) > 0 && DateTime.Now < timeout )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            downloadedData.Write( buffer, 0, bytesRead );Di2015NewLine            now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            bytesDownloaded += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Notify if timeout occured (could've been written better)Di2015NewLine        if ( DateTime.Now >= timeout )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            isTimeout = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch ( WebException ex )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Grab timeout exceptionDi2015NewLine        if ( ex.Status == WebExceptionStatus.Timeout )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            isTimeout = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Close the streamDi2015NewLine        if ( responseStream != null )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            responseStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ( downloadedData != null )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = downloadedData.GetBuffer();Di2015NewLine        downloadedData.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

done reporting results, you could also add a 2nd method to the callback to represent being done.Di2015NewLine        callback.RecordResult(null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private 19459498Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyServiceClient : DuplexClientBase<IMyService>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MyServiceClient(object callbackInstance, Binding binding, EndpointAddress remoteAddress)Di2015NewLine        : base(callbackInstance, binding, remoteAddress) { }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyServiceCallbackClient : IMyServiceCallbackDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<string> RecordResult; //If you are not using .net 4.5 you will need a custom class.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void IMyServiceCallback.OnRecordResult(string result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       var tmp = RecordResult;Di2015NewLine       if(tmp != null)Di2015NewLine           tmp(this, result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<string> GetRecords(string parameter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var uri = //...Di2015NewLine    var binding = //...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using(var collection = new BlockingCollection<string>())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var callback = new MyCallbackClient();Di2015NewLine        callback.RecordResult += (o, result) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             if(result != null)Di2015NewLine                 collection.Add(result);Di2015NewLine             elseDi2015NewLine                 collection.CompleteAdding(); //when we get a null we mark the collection completeDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var client = new MyServiceClient(callback, binding, new EndpointAddress(uri));Di2015NewLine        var proxy = client.ChannelFactory.CreateChannel();Di2015NewLine        proxy.GetRecords();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(var record in collection.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return record;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        client.Close();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19459603Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum WithBaseForDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Source,Di2015NewLine    Destination,Di2015NewLine    BothDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class AutoMapperExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IMappingExpression<TSource, TDestination> InheritMappingFromBaseType<TSource, TDestination>(Di2015NewLine        this IMappingExpression<TSource, TDestination> mappingExpression,Di2015NewLine        WithBaseFor baseFor = WithBaseFor.Both,Di2015NewLine        IMappingEngine mappingEngine = null,Di2015NewLine        IConfigurationProvider configurationProvider = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type sourceType = typeof (TSource);Di2015NewLine        Type destinationType = typeof (TDestination);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type sourceParentType = baseFor == WithBaseFor.Both || baseFor == WithBaseFor.SourceDi2015NewLine            ? sourceType.BaseTypeDi2015NewLine            : sourceType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type destinationParentType = baseFor == WithBaseFor.Both || baseFor == WithBaseFor.DestinationDi2015NewLine            ? destinationType.BaseTypeDi2015NewLine            : destinationType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mappingExpressionDi2015NewLine            .BeforeMap((sourceObject, destObject) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (mappingEngine != null)Di2015NewLine                    mappingEngine.Map(sourceObject, destObject, sourceParentType, destinationParentType);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    Mapper.Map(sourceObject, destObject, sourceParentType, destinationParentType);Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TypeMap baseTypeMap = configurationProvider != nullDi2015NewLine            ? configurationProvider.FindTypeMapFor(sourceParentType, destinationParentType)Di2015NewLine            : Mapper.FindTypeMapFor(sourceParentType, destinationParentType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (baseTypeMap == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine                string.Format("Missing map from {0} to {1}.", new object[]Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sourceParentType.Name,Di2015NewLine                    destinationParentType.NameDi2015NewLine                }));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyMap propertyMap in baseTypeMap.GetPropertyMaps())Di2015NewLine            mappingExpression.ForMember(propertyMap.DestinationProperty.Name, opt => opt.Ignore());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return mappingExpression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19459689Di2015UniqueSeparatorTim
19459689Di2015UniqueSeparatorrla4
19459689Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static int GetPathDepth(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int depth = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < path.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (path[i] == '.')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                depth++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return depth;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetPathAtDepth(string path, int depth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder pathBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] pathParts = path.Split('.');Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < depth && i < pathParts.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string pathPart = pathParts[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (i == depth - 1 || i == pathParts.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pathBuilder.Append(pathPart);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pathBuilder.AppendFormat("{0}.", pathPart);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string pathAtDepth = pathBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine        return pathAtDepth;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string[] GetIntermediatePaths(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int depth = GetPathDepth(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] intermediatePaths = new string[depth];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < intermediatePaths.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string intermediatePath = GetPathAtDepth(path, i + 1);Di2015NewLine            intermediatePaths[i] = intermediatePath;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return intermediatePaths;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static PropertyInfo GetProperty(Type root, string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo result = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] pathParts = path.Split('.');Di2015NewLine        foreach (string pathPart in pathParts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Object.ReferenceEquals(result, null))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = root.GetProperty(pathPart);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = result.PropertyType.GetProperty(pathPart);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(result, null))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("A property at the specified path could not be located.", "path");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object GetParameter(ParameterInfo parameter, Dictionary<string, string> valueMap)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type root = parameter.ParameterType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, object> instanceMap = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> valueMapEntry in valueMap)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string path = valueMapEntry.Key;Di2015NewLine            string value = valueMapEntry.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string[] intermediatePaths = GetIntermediatePaths(path);Di2015NewLine            foreach (string intermediatePath in intermediatePaths)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PropertyInfo intermediateProperty = GetProperty(root, intermediatePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                object propertyTypeInstance;Di2015NewLine                if (!instanceMap.TryGetValue(intermediatePath, out propertyTypeInstance))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    propertyTypeInstance = Activator.CreateInstance(intermediateProperty.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine                    instanceMap.Add(intermediatePath, propertyTypeInstance);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo property = GetProperty(root, path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TypeConverter converter = TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(property.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine            object convertedValue = converter.ConvertFrom(value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            instanceMap.Add(path, convertedValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object rootInstance = Activator.CreateInstance(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, object> instanceMapEntry in instanceMap)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string path = instanceMapEntry.Key;Di2015NewLine            object value = instanceMapEntry.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo property = GetProperty(root, path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            object instance;Di2015NewLine            int depth = GetPathDepth(path);Di2015NewLine            if (depth == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                instance = rootInstance;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string parentPath = GetPathAtDepth(path, depth);Di2015NewLine                instance = instanceMap[parentPath];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            property.SetValue(instance, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return rootInstance;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

    {Di2015NewLine                rng.GetBytes(ivBytes);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            using (var inputStream = File.Open(inputFile, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (var outputStream = File.Open(outputFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    outputStream.Write(ivBytes, 0, ivBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                    using (var cryptoAlgo = Aes.Create())Di2015NewLine                       while ((count = inputStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Decrypt(string inputFile, string outputFile, string key)Di2015NewLine FileShare.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                inputStream.Read(ivBytes, 0, ivBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                using (var outputStream = File.Open(outputFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (var cryptoAlgo = Aes.Create())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        using (var decryptor = cryptoAlgo.CreateDecryptor(keyBytes, ivBytes))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            using (var cryptoStream = new       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IEnumerable<T> ConvertTable<T>(DataTable dataTable) where T : new()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return MappingService.DataTableToObjects<T>(dataTable);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public class SqlToObjectReflectionMappingService : ISqlToObjectMappingServiceDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public T DataRowToObject<T>(DataRow row, PropertyDescriptorCollection propertyDescriptorCollection)Di2015NewLine                where T : new()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var obj = new T();Di2015NewLine                foreach (PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor in              return obj;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public IEnumerable<T> DataTableToObjects<T>(DataTable table) where T : new()Di2015NewLine
