19461026Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.Common;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.SqlClient;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Call ConvertTable hereDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IEnumerable<T> Map<T>(SqlDataReader dr) where T : new()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var enumerableDataReader = dr.Cast<DbDataRecord>().AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLine            var tObj = new T();Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo[] propertyInfo = tObj.GetType().GetProperties();Di2015NewLine            var batches = enumerableDataReader.Batch(10000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var resultCollection = new ConcurrentBag<List<T>>();Di2015NewLine            Parallel.ForEach(batches, batch => resultCollection.Add(MapThis<T>(propertyInfo, batch)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return resultCollection.SelectMany(m => m.Select(x => x));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<T> MapThis<T>(PropertyInfo[] propertyInfo, IEnumerable<DbDataRecord> batch) where T : new()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var list = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine            batch.AsParallel().ForAll(record =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T obj = new T();Di2015NewLine                foreach (PropertyInfo prop in propertyInfo)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var dbVal = record[prop.Name];Di2015NewLine                    if (!Equals(dbVal, DBNull.Value))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        prop.SetValue(obj, dbVal, null);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                list.Add(obj);Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine            return list;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Take a collection and split it into smaller collectionsDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T">The Type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="collection">The collection to split</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="batchSize">The size of each batch</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Batch<T>(this IEnumerable<T> collection, int batchSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var nextbatch = new List<T>(batchSize);Di2015NewLine            if (collection == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            foreach (T item in collection)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                nextbatch.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                if (nextbatch.Count != batchSize)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                yield return nextbatch;Di2015NewLine                nextbatch = new List<T>(batchSize);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (nextbatch.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return nextbatch;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19463380Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar query = from acct in acctsDi2015NewLine    select newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        acct.From,Di2015NewLine        acct.To,Di2015NewLine        acct.Amount,Di2015NewLine        FirstOrientedAmount = ((acct.From.CompareTo(acct.To) == -1 && acct.Amount < 0) ||Di2015NewLine            (acct.From.CompareTo(acct.To) >= 0 && acct.Amount > 0)) ? acct.Amount : 0,Di2015NewLine        SecondOrientedAmount = ((acct.From.CompareTo(acct.To) >= 0 && acct.Amount < 0) ||Di2015NewLine            (acct.From.CompareTo(acct.To) == -1 && acct.Amount > 0)) ? acct.Amount * -1 : 0Di2015NewLine    } into rDi2015NewLine    group r by newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        First = (r.From.CompareTo(r.To) == -1 ? r.From : r.To),Di2015NewLine        Second = (r.From.CompareTo(r.To) == -1 ? r.To : r.From)Di2015NewLine    } into gDi2015NewLine    select newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        First = g.Sum(acctval => acctval.FirstOrientedAmount) + g.Sum(acctval => acctval.SecondOrientedAmount) > 0 ? g.Key.Second : g.Key.First,Di2015NewLine        Second = g.Sum(acctval => acctval.FirstOrientedAmount) + g.Sum(acctval => acctval.SecondOrientedAmount) > 0 ? g.Key.First : g.Key.Second,Di2015NewLine        FTotal = g.Sum(acctval => acctval.FirstOrientedAmount),Di2015NewLine        STotal = g.Sum(acctval => acctval.SecondOrientedAmount),Di2015NewLine        Total = g.Sum(acctval => acctval.FirstOrientedAmount) + g.Sum(acctval => acctval.SecondOrientedAmount),Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine
19463380Di2015UniqueSeparatorCAD USD -150Di2015NewLineGBP AUD 500Di2015NewLine
19463380Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar query = from p in acctsDi2015NewLine    select newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        p.From,Di2015NewLine        p.To,Di2015NewLine        p.Amount,Di2015NewLine        OrientedAmount = ((p.From.CompareTo(p.To) == -1 && p.Amount < 0) ||Di2015NewLine            (p.From.CompareTo(p.To) >= 0 && p.Amount > 0)) ? p.Amount : p.Amount * -1Di2015NewLine    } into rDi2015NewLine    group r by newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        First = (r.From.CompareTo(r.To) == -1 ? r.From : r.To),Di2015NewLine        Second = (r.From.CompareTo(r.To) == -1 ? r.To : r.From)Di2015NewLine    } into gDi2015NewLine    select newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        g.Key.First,Di2015NewLine        g.Key.Second,Di2015NewLine        Total = g.Sum(val => val.OrientedAmount)Di2015NewLine    } into lastDi2015NewLine    select newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        First  = last.Total > 0 ? last.Second : last.First,Di2015NewLine        Second = last.Total > 0 ? last.First : last.Second,Di2015NewLine        Total = last.TotalDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine

19481208Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic MainClass()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // just using auto-properties here. Will need initialized before use.Di2015NewLine    public ChildClass cc { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public OtherChild oc { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Constructor. Gets called when initializing as "new MainClass()"Di2015NewLine     public MainClass() Di2015NewLine     {                Di2015NewLine        // initialize our propertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // option 1 - initialize, then setDi2015NewLine        cc = new ChildClass();Di2015NewLine        cc.childName = "some name"; //Set the name property of childclassDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //option 2 - initialize and set via constructorDi2015NewLine        cc = new ChildClass("some name");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // option 3 - initialize and set with initializer (more here: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/vstudio/bb397680.aspx)Di2015NewLine        cc = new ChildClass() { name = "some name" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        oc = new OtherChild(cc);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic ChildClass()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string name { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Default constructor. this.name will = null after this is runDi2015NewLine    public ChildClass() Di2015NewLine    {                Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Other constructor. this.name = passed in "name" after this is runDi2015NewLine    public ChildClass(string name) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //"this.name" specifies that you are referring to the name that belongs to this classDi2015NewLine        this.name = name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic OtherChild()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ChildClass cc { get; set; } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public OtherChild() Di2015NewLine    {        Di2015NewLine       cc = new ChildClass(); // initialize object in the default constructorDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public OtherChild(ChildClass childClass) Di2015NewLine    {        Di2015NewLine       cc = childClass; // set to the reference of the passed in childClassDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19483264Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ActionResultToCoreConverter : ITypeConverter<ActionResult, Core>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Core Convert(ResolutionContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = (ActionResult)context.SourceValue;Di2015NewLine        var employee = result.Employee;Di2015NewLine        var core = (Core)context.DestinationValue ?? new Core();Di2015NewLine        var employeeToUpdate = Di2015NewLine            core.Employees.FirstOrDefault(e => e.Name == employee.Name);Di2015NewLine        Mapper.Map(employee, employeeToUpdate);Di2015NewLine        return core;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19483318Di2015UniqueSeparator        var r = new System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex(@"(?<Num>[+-]+[\\d]+.[\\d]+)");Di2015NewLine        foreach (var g in foo) {Di2015NewLine            var st = g.First();Di2015NewLine            var mt = r.Matches(st);Di2015NewLine            var sums = new double[mt.Count];Di2015NewLine            foreach (var l in g) {Di2015NewLine                var m = r.Matches(l);Di2015NewLine                for (var i = 0; i < m.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine                    double d;Di2015NewLine                    if (double.TryParse(m[i].Value, out d)) {Di2015NewLine                        sums[i] += d;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            var start = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < mt.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(st.Substring(start, mt[i].Index - start));Di2015NewLine                if (sums[i] >= 0.0) { sb.Append("+"); }Di2015NewLine                else                { sb.Append("-"); }Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(sums[i]);Di2015NewLine                start = mt[i].Index + mt[i].Length;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendLine(st.Substring(start));Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine

19493338Di2015UniqueSeparator public class GlobalRedirectHandler : DelegatingHandler {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Task<HttpResponseMessage> SendAsync(HttpRequestMessage request, CancellationToken cancellationToken) {Di2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<HttpResponseMessage>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.SendAsync(request, cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine            .ContinueWith(t => {Di2015NewLine                HttpResponseMessage response;Di2015NewLine                try {Di2015NewLine                    response = t.Result;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine                    response = new HttpResponseMessage(HttpStatusCode.ServiceUnavailable);Di2015NewLine                    response.ReasonPhrase = e.Message;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.MovedPermanentlyDi2015NewLine                    || response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.MovedDi2015NewLine                    || response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.RedirectDi2015NewLine                    || response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.FoundDi2015NewLine                    || response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.SeeOtherDi2015NewLine                    || response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.RedirectKeepVerbDi2015NewLine                    || response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.TemporaryRedirectDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    || (int)response.StatusCode == 308) Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    var newRequest = CopyRequest(response.RequestMessage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.Redirect Di2015NewLine                        || response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.FoundDi2015NewLine                        || response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.SeeOther)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        newRequest.Content = null;Di2015NewLine                        newRequest.Method = HttpMethod.Get;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    newRequest.RequestUri = response.Headers.Location;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    base.SendAsync(newRequest, cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine                        .ContinueWith(t2 => tcs.SetResult(t2.Result));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else {Di2015NewLine                    tcs.SetResult(response);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static HttpRequestMessage CopyRequest(HttpRequestMessage oldRequest) {Di2015NewLine        var newrequest = new HttpRequestMessage(oldRequest.Method, oldRequest.RequestUri);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var header in oldRequest.Headers) {Di2015NewLine            newrequest.Headers.TryAddWithoutValidation(header.Key, header.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property in oldRequest.Properties) {Di2015NewLine            newrequest.Properties.Add(property);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (oldRequest.Content != null) newrequest.Content = new StreamContent(oldRequest.Content.ReadAsStreamAsync().Result);Di2015NewLine        return newrequest;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19502424Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Shift FindCurrentShift(DateTime currentDateTime)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Shift shift = LastShift(currentDateTime, currentDateTime.Date);Di2015NewLine// not in shift that started today? then check yesterdayDi2015NewLine    if (shift == null) {Di2015NewLine        shift = LastShift(currentDateTime, currentDateTime.Date.AddDays(-1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return shift;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Shift LastShift(DateTime currentDateTime, DateTime startOfDay)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinereturn shifts.Where(s => startOfDay.Add(s.BeginTime) <= currentDateTimeDi2015NewLine               && startOfDay.Add(s.BeginTime).AddHours(s.LengthHours) >= currentDateTime)Di2015NewLine        .OrderByDescending(s => s.BeginTime)Di2015NewLine        .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//initalize this with shiftsDi2015NewLinepublic List<Shift> shifts;Di2015NewLine

19503041Di2015UniqueSeparatorraycast
19503041Di2015UniqueSeparator    public float end_time;Di2015NewLinepublic float start_time;Di2015NewLinepublic float running_time;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Texture2D progress_bar_empty;Di2015NewLinepublic Texture2D progress_bar_full;Di2015NewLinepublic Material highlight_material;Di2015NewLinepublic float progress = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool trackTimer = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic List<string> _tags = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic GameObject lastHitObject = null;Di2015NewLineprivate Material oldMat;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Use this for initializationDi2015NewLinevoid Start () Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ResetTimer();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Update is called once per frameDi2015NewLinevoid Update () Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    EyeTarget();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Update the timer if and only if we are tracking time ANDDi2015NewLine    // the last ray cast hit something.Di2015NewLine    bool updateTimer = (trackTimer && lastHitObject != null);  Di2015NewLine    Check(updateTimer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid EyeTarget()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    RaycastHit hit;Di2015NewLine    bool hitTaggedObject = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Vector3 fwd = transform.TransformDirection(Vector3.forward);Di2015NewLine    if (Physics.Raycast(transform.position, fwd, out hit))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach(string t in _tags)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(hit.collider.gameObject.tag == t)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                HighLight(hit.collider.gameObject);Di2015NewLine                hitTaggedObject = true;Di2015NewLine            }                   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ** Make sure to clean up highlighting if nothing new was hitDi2015NewLine    if (!hitTaggedObject){Di2015NewLine        HighLight(null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid ResetTimer()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    start_time = Time.time;Di2015NewLine    running_time = 0f;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid HighLight(GameObject nextHitObject)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Case1: Last ray and new ray both hit objectsDi2015NewLine    if(lastHitObject != null && nextHitObject != null){Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //1a: same objects, do nothingDi2015NewLine        if(lastHitObject.tag == nextHitObject.tag)return;   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        {   //1b: different objects, swap highlight textureDi2015NewLine            lastHitObject.renderer.material = oldMat;Di2015NewLine            lastHitObject = nextHitObject;Di2015NewLine            oldMat = lastHitObject.renderer.material;Di2015NewLine            lastHitObject.renderer.material = highlight_material;Di2015NewLine            trackTimer = true;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Case2: Last ray hit nothing, new ray hit object.Di2015NewLine    if(lastHitObject == null && nextHitObject != null){Di2015NewLine        ResetTimer();Di2015NewLine        lastHitObject = nextHitObject;Di2015NewLine        oldMat = lastHitObject.renderer.material;Di2015NewLine        lastHitObject.renderer.material = highlight_material;Di2015NewLine        trackTimer = true;Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Case3: Last ray hit something, new ray hit nothingDi2015NewLine    if(lastHitObject != null && nextHitObject == null){Di2015NewLine        lastHitObject.renderer.material = oldMat;Di2015NewLine        lastHitObject = null;Di2015NewLine        trackTimer = false;Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// see if ray has hit objectDi2015NewLinevoid Check(bool updateTimer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(updateTimer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        start_time = Time.time - end_time;Di2015NewLine        running_time += Time.deltaTime;Di2015NewLine        if ( running_time >= end_time )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            trackTimer = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19504940Di2015UniqueSeparator    private byte[] GetWordDocumentData(byte[] wordBytes, string path) //Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Save bytes to word file in temp dir, open, copy info. docs = app.Documents;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object fpath = tmpPath;Di2015NewLine        object visible = false;Di2015NewLine        object readOnly =       doc.Activate(); //NewDi2015NewLine        doc.ActiveWindow.Selection.WholeStory();Di2015NewLine        doc.ActiveWindow.Selection.Copy();Di2015NewLine        IDataObject data = myDocument.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create a font that will accept unicode characters.Di2015NewLine            BaseFont bfArial = BaseFont.CreateFont(@"C:\\Windows\\Fonts\\Arial.ttf", BaseFont.IDENTITY_H, BaseFont.EMBEDDED);Di2015NewLine            Font arial = new Font(bfArial, 12);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If Hebrew character found, change page direction of documentText.Di2015NewLine            PdfPCell page = new PdfPCell(new Paragraph(documentText, arial)) { Colspan = 1 };Di2015NewLine            Match rgx = Regex.Match(documentText, @"\\p{IsArabic}|\\p{IsHebrew}");Di2015NewLine            if (rgx.Success) page.RunDirection = PdfWriter.RUN_DIRECTION_RTL;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            table.AddCell(page);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add image to document (Not in order with text...)Di2015NewLine            foreach (Word.InlineShape ils in doc.InlineShapes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (ils != null && ils.Type == Word.WdInlineShapeType.wdInlineShapePicture)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    PdfPCell imageCell =                     img.Save(ms, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLine                        imgb = ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            myDocument.Add(table);Di2015NewLine            myDocument.Close();Di2015NewLine            myPDFWriter.Close();Di2015NewLine            wordDoc = myMemoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Cleanup(x, tmpPath, app, doc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return wordDoc;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
19504940Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void Cleanup(object x, string tmpPath, Word.ApplicationClass app, Word.Document doc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Clipboard.Clear();Di2015NewLine        object Save = false;Di2015NewLine        (doc as Word._Document).Close(ref Save, ref x, ref x);Di2015NewLine        doc = null;Di2015NewLine        (app as Word._Application).Quit();Di2015NewLine        app = null;Di2015NewLine        try { File.Delete(tmpPath); }Di2015NewLine        catch { }Di2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine        GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine        GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

 {Di2015NewLine        _finished = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Thread Safe Extension MethodDi2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private delegate void SetPropertyThreadSafeDelegate<TResult>(Control @this, Expression<Func<TResult>> property, TResult value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void SetPropertyThreadSafe<TResult>(this Control @this, Expression<Func<TResult>> property, TResult value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var propertyInfo = (property.Body as MemberExpression).Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (propertyInfo == null ||Di2015NewLine            !@this.GetType().IsSubclassOf(propertyInfo.ReflectedType) ||Di2015NewLine            @this.GetType().GetProperty(propertyInfo.Name, propertyInfo.PropertyType) == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("The lambda expression 19510015Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class ViewModelBase : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<string, object> 19514093Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Point[] GetPoints(Rectangle container){Di2015NewLine  Point[] points = new Point[6];Di2015NewLine  int half = container.Height / 2;Di2015NewLine  int quart = container.Width/4;Di2015NewLine  points[0] = new Point(container.Left + quart, container.Top);Di2015NewLine  points[1] = new Point(container.Right - quart, container.Top);Di2015NewLine  points[2] = new Point(container.Right, container.Top + half);Di2015NewLine  points[3] = new Point(container.Right - quart, container.Bottom);Di2015NewLine  points[4] = new Point(container.Left + quart, container.Bottom);Di2015NewLine  points[5] = new Point(container.Left, container.Top + half);Di2015NewLine  return points;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate void Parent_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine  //This should be placed firstDi2015NewLine  // Make the button big enough to hold the whole region.Di2015NewLine  btnExam.SetBounds( btnExam.Location.X, btnExam.Location.Y, 100, 100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Make the GraphicsPath.Di2015NewLine  GraphicsPath polygon_path = new GraphicsPath(FillMode.Winding);Di2015NewLine  polygon_path.AddPolygon(GetPoints(btnExam.ClientRectangle));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Convert the GraphicsPath into a Region.Di2015NewLine  Region polygon_region = new Region(polygon_path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Constrain the button to the region.Di2015NewLine  btnExam.Region = polygon_region;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public string Type { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     return }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void IncludeInHash(MyClass item)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     hashCode ^= item.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void hashCode;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public int IndexOf(MyClass item)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     return internalList.IndexOf(item);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine affecting the hashDi2015NewLine     IncludeInHash(item);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void RemoveAt(int index)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     MyClass reduce = internalList[index];Di2015NewLine     internalList.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine     // Make sure RemoveAt is successful before affecting the hashDi2015NewLine internalList[index];Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     setDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        MyClass reduce = internalList[index];Di2015NewLine        internalList[index] = value;Di2015NewLine        // Make sure these happen atomically; don't allow exceptions to prevent these from being accurate.Di2015NewLine        ExcludeFromHash(reduce);Di2015NewLine 19527509Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static int _fileProcessed;Di2015NewLine    private static Semaphore _pool;Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // let say I have a list of file names in an arrayDi2015NewLine        string[] files = { "a", "b", "c", "d", "e", "f", "g", "h", "i", "j", "k", "l", "m", "n", "o", "p", "q", "r", "s", "t", "u", "v", "w", "x", "z" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // we only want 10 threads working at one timeDi2015NewLine        _fileProcessed = 0;Di2015NewLine        _pool = new Semaphore(10, 10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string file in files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _pool.WaitOne();    // wait until I have a free resource Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Thread t = new Thread(() => ProcessFile(file));Di2015NewLine            t.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // you can either wait here until are theads are doneDi2015NewLine        // or exitDi2015NewLine        // In the example I want to waitDi2015NewLine        while (_fileProcessed < files.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("We are done!");Di2015NewLine        //Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ProcessFile(string fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int id = System.Threading.Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} - {1:HH:mm:ss.fff} - Working on File: {2}", id, DateTime.Now, fileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Do Work ....Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // to simulate work getting done - get a number of secondsDi2015NewLine        // between 10 & 30 secondsDi2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(GetWorkLength());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} - {1:HH:mm:ss.fff} - Worked Completed on file: {2}", id, DateTime.Now, fileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Interlocked.Add(ref _fileProcessed, 1);         Di2015NewLine        _pool.Release();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Random work lengthDi2015NewLine    private static Random _workLength = new Random();Di2015NewLine    private static object _lock = new object();Di2015NewLine    private static int GetWorkLength()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_lock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _workLength.Next(10, 30) * 1000;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19529558Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ResolveShortcut(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // this gets the full path from a shortcut (.lnk file).Di2015NewLine    ShellLink link = new ShellLink();Di2015NewLine    ((IPersistFile)link).Load(filename, STGM_READ);Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(MAX_PATH);Di2015NewLine    WIN32_FIND_DATAW data = new WIN32_FIND_DATAW();Di2015NewLine    ((IShellLinkW)link).GetPath(sb, sb.Capacity, out data, 0);Di2015NewLine    string final_string = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    if (final_string.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        final_string = filename;Di2015NewLine    // If the the shortcut's target resolves to the Program Files or System32 directory, and the user is on aDi2015NewLine    // 64-bit machine, the final string may actually point to C:\\Program Files (x86) or C:\\Windows\\SYSWOW64.Di2015NewLine    // This is due to File System Redirection in Windows -- http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa365743%28VS.85%29.aspx.Di2015NewLine    // Unfortunately the solution there doesn't appear to work for 32-bit apps on 64-bit machines.Di2015NewLine    // We will provide a workaround here:Di2015NewLine    string new_path = Validate_Shortcut_Path(final_string, "SysWOW64", "System32");Di2015NewLine    if (File.Exists(new_path) == true && File.Exists(final_string) == false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // the file is actually stored in System32 instead of SysWOW64. Let's update it.Di2015NewLine        final_string = new_path;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    new_path = Validate_Shortcut_Path(final_string, "Program Files (x86)", "Program Files");Di2015NewLine    if (File.Exists(new_path) == true && File.Exists(final_string) == false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // the file is actually stored in Program Files instead of Program Files (x86). Let's update it.Di2015NewLine        final_string = new_path;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // the lnk may incorrectly resolve to the C:\\Windows\\Installer directory. Check for this.Di2015NewLine    if (final_string.ToLower().IndexOf("windows\\\\installer") > -1)Di2015NewLine        final_string = filename;Di2015NewLine    if (File.Exists(final_string))Di2015NewLine        return final_string;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return filename;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string Validate_Shortcut_Path(string final_string, string find_what, string replace_with)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string final_string_lower = final_string.ToLower();Di2015NewLine    string find_what_lower = find_what.ToLower();Di2015NewLine    int find_value = final_string_lower.IndexOf(find_what_lower);Di2015NewLine    if (find_value > -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // the shortcut resolved to the find_what directory, which can be SysWOW64 or Program Files (x86), Di2015NewLine        // but this may not be correct. Let's check by replacing it with another value.Di2015NewLine        string new_string = final_string.Substring(0, find_value) + replace_with + final_string.Substring(find_value + find_what.Length);Di2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(new_string) == true && File.Exists(final_string) == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // the file is actually stored at a different location. Let's update it.Di2015NewLine            final_string = new_string;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return final_string;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19529594Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string FormatFilename(string pattern, DateTime dt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Regex.Replace(pattern, @"\\{(.*)\\}", match =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string format = match.Result("$1").Replace("m", "M");Di2015NewLine        return dt.ToString(format, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19529594Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring input = "myFile{ddmmyyyy}.csv";Di2015NewLineDateTime dt = new DateTime(2013, 1, 4);Di2015NewLinestring filename = FormatFilename(input, dt);Di2015NewLine
19529594Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string FormatFilename(string pattern, DateTime dt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return string.Format(pattern.Replace("{", "{0:").Replace("mm", "MM"), dt);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        ISize Size { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        IColor Color { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        IAuthor Author { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Object: IObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool isDirty = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        readonly int id;Di2015NewLine        int size;Di2015NewLine        int color;Di2015NewLine        int author;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IColorResolver colors;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Id { get { return this.id; }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!this.color.Equals(value.Id))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.color = value.Id;Di2015NewLine                    this.isDirty = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Object(int id, int size, int color, int author, IColorResolver colorResolver)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.id = id;Di2015NewLine            this.size = size;Di2015NewLine            this.color = color;Di2015NewLine            this.author = author;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.colors = colorResolver;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add, update, delete methodsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public interface ILookupValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int Id { get; }Di2015NewLine        string Name { get; /*set;*/ } //no set since this is a lookup so we don't want to amend itDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public interface IColor: ILookupValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IColorResolver GetResolver();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public interface IAuthor : ILookupValue { /* ... */ }Di2015NewLine    public interface ISize : ILookupValue { /* ... */ }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Color : IColorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int id;Di2015NewLine        string name;Di2015NewLine        IColorResolver colors;Di2015NewLine        public int Id { get { return this.id; 19530107Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Mapper()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PropertyMap = typeof(T).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public |Di2015NewLine                                              BindingFlags.NonPublic |Di2015NewLine                                              BindingFlags.Instance)Di2015NewLine                                              .ToDictionary(p => p.Name.ToLower(), p => p);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    FieldMap = typeof(T).GetFields(BindingFlags.Public |Di2015NewLine                                                BindingFlags.NonPublic |Di2015NewLine                                                BindingFlags.Instance)Di2015NewLine                                                .ToDictionary(f => f.Name.ToLower(), f => f);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19530107Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Map(ExpandoObject source, T destination)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    if (destination == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("destination");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var kv in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo p;Di2015NewLine        if (PropertyMap.TryGetValue(kv.Key.ToLower(), out p))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.SetValue(destination, kv.Value, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FieldInfo f;Di2015NewLine            if (FieldMap.TryGetValue(kv.Key.ToLower(), out f))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                f.SetValue(destination, kv.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19530107Di2015UniqueSeparatorMergeProperty
19530107Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void MergeProperty(PropertyInfo pi, ExpandoObject source, object target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type propType = pi.PropertyType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // dont recurse for value type, Nullable<T> and stringsDi2015NewLine    if (propType.IsValueType || propType == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sourceVal = source.First(kvp => kvp.Key == pi.Name).Value;Di2015NewLine        if(sourceVal != null)Di2015NewLine            pi.SetValue(target, sourceVal, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else // recursively map inner class propertiesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var props = propType.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public |Di2015NewLine                                                  BindingFlags.NonPublic |Di2015NewLine                                                  BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var p in props)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sourcePropValue = source.First(kvp => kvp.Key == pi.Name).Value;Di2015NewLine            var targetPropValue = pi.GetValue(target, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (sourcePropValue != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (targetPropValue == null) // replaceDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pi.SetValue(target, source.First(kvp => kvp.Key == pi.Name).Value, null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MergeProperty(p, sourcePropValue, targetPropValue);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void MergeProperty(PropertyInfo pi, object source, object target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type propType = pi.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo sourcePi = source.GetType().GetProperty(pi.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // dont recurse for value type, Nullable<T> and stringsDi2015NewLine    if (propType.IsValueType || propType == typeof(string)) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sourceVal = sourcePi.GetValue(source, null);Di2015NewLine        if(sourceVal != null)Di2015NewLine            pi.SetValue(target, sourceVal, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else // recursively map inner class propertiesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var props = propType.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public |Di2015NewLine                                                  BindingFlags.NonPublic |Di2015NewLine                                                  BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var p in props)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sourcePropValue = sourcePi.GetValue(source, null);Di2015NewLine            var targetPropValue = pi.GetValue(target, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (sourcePropValue != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (targetPropValue == null) // replaceDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pi.SetValue(target, sourcePi.GetValue(source, null), null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MergeProperty(p, sourcePropValue, targetPropValue);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19530107Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Map(ExpandoObject source, T destination)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    if (destination == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("destination");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var kv in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo p;Di2015NewLine        if (PropertyMap.TryGetValue(kv.Key.ToLower(), out p))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MergeProperty(p, source, destination);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // do similar merge for fieldsDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19533274Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GetValueAsString(object obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(obj == null) Di2015NewLine         return "(null)";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(obj is IEnumerable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         var values = ((IEnumerable)obj).Cast<object>();Di2015NewLine         return "{" + string.Join(", ", values.Select(GetValueAsString)) + "}";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return obj.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19533365Di2015UniqueSeparator            string x1 = "8:7:15";//1st column valueDi2015NewLine            string x2 = "9:15:12";//2ndcolumn valueDi2015NewLine            string x3 = "10:3:4";//3rd column valueDi2015NewLine            string x4 = "1:1:1";Di2015NewLine            string x5 = "1:1:1";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // , I just assign 5 values,but you can assign more than lot values  in this array Di2015NewLine            string[] xxA = new string[5];Di2015NewLine            xxA[0] = x1;Di2015NewLine            xxA[1] = x2;Di2015NewLine            xxA[2] = x3;Di2015NewLine            xxA[3] = x4;Di2015NewLine            xxA[4] = x5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string Tvalue1 = "0";Di2015NewLine            string Tvalue2 = "0";Di2015NewLine            string Tvalue3 = "0";Di2015NewLine      //Now the xxA has 5 rows (No problem for how many rows ) So this foreach will round 5 time Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for(int i = 0; i < GridView1.Rows.Count; i++)//Now xxA.Length is 5Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               string x = GridView1.Rows[i].Cells[9].ToString();Di2015NewLine               int n=GridView1.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLine               string[] xxA=new string[n]; Di2015NewLine                xxA[i] = x; Di2015NewLine      //Here is the some logic's for the calculation and formating  Di2015NewLine                string[] Cx1 = xxA[i].Split(':');Di2015NewLine                Tvalue1 = (Convert.ToInt32(Tvalue1) + Convert.ToInt32(Cx1[0])).ToString() ;Di2015NewLine                Tvalue2 = (Convert.ToInt32(Tvalue2) + Convert.ToInt32(Cx1[1])).ToString() ;Di2015NewLine                Tvalue3 = (Convert.ToInt32(Tvalue3) + Convert.ToInt32(Cx1[2])).ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            string FInalValue = Tvalue1 +":"+ Tvalue2 + ":"+ Tvalue3;Di2015NewLine

19534008Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static BitmapSource RenderToBitmap(Di2015NewLine    this UIElement element, double scale, Brush background)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var renderWidth = (int)(element.RenderSize.Width * scale);Di2015NewLine    var renderHeight = (int)(element.RenderSize.Height * scale);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var renderTarget = new RenderTargetBitmap(renderWidth, renderHeight,Di2015NewLine                                              96, 96, PixelFormats.Default);Di2015NewLine    var sourceBrush = new VisualBrush(element);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var drawingVisual = new DrawingVisual();Di2015NewLine    var drawingContext = drawingVisual.RenderOpen();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var rect = new Rect(0, 0, element.RenderSize.Width, element.RenderSize.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (drawingContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        drawingContext.PushTransform(new ScaleTransform(scale, scale));Di2015NewLine        drawingContext.DrawRectangle(background, null, rect); // hereDi2015NewLine        drawingContext.DrawRectangle(sourceBrush, null, rect);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    renderTarget.Render(drawingVisual);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return renderTarget;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19534163Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic byte ReadFromStorage(Storage s, int n) {Di2015NewLine    var handle = default(GCHandle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        handle = GCHandle.Alloc(s, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine        var ptr = handle.AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var arrSize = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(Storage));Di2015NewLine        var arr = new Byte[arrSize];Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(ptr, arr, 0, arrSize);Di2015NewLine        return arr[n];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } finally {Di2015NewLine        if (handle.IsAllocated)Di2015NewLine            handle.Free();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

dropTableOperation.AnonymousArguments);Di2015NewLine            base.Generate(newDropTableOperation);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string _GetNameWithReplacedSchema(string name)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] nameParts = name.Split('.');Di2015NewLine            string newName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint oldX, oldY; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Camera(Vector3 cameraPosition, float moveSpeed, float rotateSpeed, float filedOfView, GraphicsDevice device, float PerspectiveFieldOfView) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLinethis.cameraPosition = cameraPosition; Di2015NewLinethis.moveSpeed = moveSpeed; Di2015NewLinethis.rotateSpeed = rotateSpeed; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinethis.device = device; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineview = Matrix.CreateLookAt(cameraPosition, Vector3.Zero, Vector3.Up); Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Update() Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLineKeyboardState kState = Keyboard.GetState(); // make is able to use your keysDi2015NewLineVector3 v = new Vector3(0, 0, -50) * moveSpeed; // let you permanent walk Di2015NewLinemove(v);                                        // isnt essential could be deleted if you wont thatDi2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (kState.IsKeyDown(Keys.W)) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLineVector3 v = new Vector3(0, 0, -100) * moveSpeed; Di2015NewLinemove(v); Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (kState.IsKeyDown(Keys.S)) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLineVector3 v = new Vector3(0, 0, 50) * moveSpeed; Di2015NewLine move(v); Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (kState.IsKeyDown(Keys.A)) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLineVector3 v = new Vector3(-50, 0, 0) * moveSpeed; SelectListFor<T>()Di2015NewLine                                : SelectListFor(selected.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Creates a SelectList for an enum typeDi2015NewLine    public static SelectList SelectListFor<T>() where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type t = typeof (T);Di2015NewLine        if (t.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var values = Enum.GetValues(typeof(T)).Cast<enum>()Di2015NewLine                             .Select(e => new { Di2015NewLine                                            Id = Convert.ToInt32(e), Di2015NewLine                                            Name = e.GetDescription() Di2015NewLine                                          });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new SelectList(values, "Id", "Name");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Creates a SelectList for an enum valueDi2015NewLine    public Di2015NewLine                                            Name = e.GetDescription() Di2015NewLine                                          });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new attribute if the Di2015NewLine    // enum has one, otherwise use the value.Di2015NewLine    public static string GetDescription<TEnum>(this TEnum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FieldInfo 19545007Di2015UniqueSeparator    static public string MatchKey(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       string strRegex = @"(__u__)(.+?:\\s*)""(.*)""(,|})*";Di2015NewLine        Regex myRegex = new Regex(strRegex, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Multiline);Di2015NewLine        IQS_Encryption.Encryption enc = new Encryption();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int count = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string addedJson = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int matchCount = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (Match myMatch in myRegex.Matches(input))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (myMatch.Success)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Console.WriteLine("REGEX MYMATCH: " + myMatch.Value);Di2015NewLine                input = input.Replace(myMatch.Value, "__e__" + myMatch.Groups[2].Value + "\\"c" +  count + "\\"" + myMatch.Groups[4].Value);Di2015NewLine                addedJson += "c"+count + "{" +enc.EncryptString(myMatch.Groups[3].Value, Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("12345678912365478912365478965412"))+"},";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine            matchCount++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("MAC" + matchCount);Di2015NewLine        return input + addedJson;Di2015NewLine    }`Di2015NewLine

19547050Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SortExcel()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Set upDi2015NewLine    Excel.Application oXL;Di2015NewLine    Excel._Workbook oWB;Di2015NewLine Application object.Di2015NewLine    oXL = new Excel.Application();Di2015NewLine    oXL.Visible = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get a new workbook.;Di2015NewLine    oWB = (Excel._Workbook)(oXL.Workbooks.Open(@"C:\\Book.Xlsx"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get Sheet ObjectDi2015NewLine    oSheet = (Excel.Worksheet)oWB.Worksheets["Sheet1"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get complete last Row in Sheet (Not last used just last)     Di2015NewLine    int intRows = oSheet.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get the last cell in Column AADi2015NewLine    oLastAACell = (Excel.Range)oSheet.Cells[intRows, 27];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Move courser up to the last cell in AA that is not blankDi2015NewLine    oLastAACell = oLastAACell.End[Excel.XlDirection.xlUp];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get First Cell of Data (A2)Di2015NewLine    oFirstACell = (Excel.Range)oSheet.Cells[2, 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get Entire Range of DataDi2015NewLine    oRng = (Excel.Range)oSheet.Range[oFirstACell, oLastAACell];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Sort the range based on First Columns And 6th (in this case A and F)Di2015NewLine    oRng.Sort(oRng.Columns[1, Type.Missing],Excel.XlSortOrder.xlAscending, // the first sort key Column 1 for RangeDi2015NewLine              oRng.Columns[6, Type.Missing],Type.Missing, Excel.XlSortOrder.xlAscending,// second sort key Column 6 of the rangeDi2015NewLine              Type.Missing, Excel.XlSortOrder.xlAscending,  // third sort key nothing, but it wants oneDi2015NewLine              Excel.XlYesNoGuess.xlGuess, Type.Missing, Type.Missing, Di2015NewLine              Excel.XlSortOrientation.xlSortColumns, Excel.XlSortMethod.xlPinYin,   Di2015NewLine              Excel.XlSortDataOption.xlSortNormal,Di2015NewLine              Excel.XlSortDataOption.xlSortNormal, Di2015NewLine              Excel.XlSortDataOption.xlSortNormal);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19551892Di2015UniqueSeparatorEither<TLeft, TRight>
19551892Di2015UniqueSeparatorEither
19551892Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar goodResult = Either.Right<Exception,int>(1);Di2015NewLinevar exception = Either.Left<Exception,int>(new Exception());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* base class for LeftValue and RightValue types */Di2015NewLinepublic abstract class Either<TLeft, TRight>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public abstract bool IsLeft { get; }Di2015NewLine    public bool IsRight { get { return !IsLeft; } }Di2015NewLine    public abstract TLeft Left { get; }Di2015NewLine    public abstract TRight Right { get;  }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class EitherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public sealed class LeftValue<TLeft, TRight> : Either<TLeft, TRight>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TLeft _leftValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public LeftValue(TLeft leftValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _leftValue = leftValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override TLeft Left { get { return _leftValue; } }Di2015NewLine        public override TRight Right { get { return default(TRight); } }Di2015NewLine        public override bool IsLeft { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public sealed class RightValue<TLeft, TRight> : Either<TLeft, TRight>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TRight _rightValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public RightValue(TRight rightValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _rightValue = rightValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override TLeft Left { get { return default(TLeft); } }Di2015NewLine        public override TRight Right { get { return _rightValue; } }Di2015NewLine        public override bool IsLeft { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Factory functions to create left or right-valued Either instancesDi2015NewLine    public static Either<TLeft, TRight> Left<TLeft, TRight>(TLeft leftValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new LeftValue<TLeft, TRight>(leftValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Either<TLeft, TRight> Right<TLeft, TRight>(TRight rightValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new RightValue<TLeft, TRight>(rightValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19551892Di2015UniqueSeparator// An infinite supply of parametersDi2015NewLineprivate static int count = 0;Di2015NewLinepublic int ParameterFactory()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ++count; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19551892Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IObservable<Either<Exception, TResult>> Poll<TResult, TArg>(Di2015NewLine    Func<TArg, IObservable<TResult>> asyncFunction,Di2015NewLine    Func<TArg> parameterFactory,Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan interval,Di2015NewLine    IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Observable.Create<Either<Exception, TResult>>(observer =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return scheduler.ScheduleAsync(async (ctrl, ct) => {Di2015NewLine            while(!ct.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var result = await asyncFunction(parameterFactory());Di2015NewLine                    observer.OnNext(Either.Right<Exception,TResult>(result));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    observer.OnNext(Either.Left<Exception, TResult>(ex));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                await ctrl.Sleep(interval, ct);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });        Di2015NewLine    });    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19554055Di2015UniqueSeparator    var downsizeImage = ImageTools.ConvertToBitonal(scaledBmp, 500);Di2015NewLine                    downsizeImage.Save(string.Format(@"C:\\Temp\\{0}Downsized.png", betSlipImage.BetSlipID), ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine                    var ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine                    downsizeImage.Save(ms, ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public static Bitmap ConvertToBitonal(Bitmap original, int threshold)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Bitmap source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If original bitmap is not already in 32 BPP, ARGB format, then convertDi2015NewLine            if (original.PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                source = new Bitmap(original.Width, original.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine                source.SetResolution(original.HorizontalResolution, original.VerticalResolution);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (var g = Graphics.FromImage(source))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    g.DrawImageUnscaled(original, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                source = original;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Lock source bitmap in memoryDi2015NewLine            var sourceData = source.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, source.Width, source.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Copy image data to binary arrayDi2015NewLine            var imageSize = sourceData.Stride * sourceData.Height;Di2015NewLine            var sourceBuffer = new byte[imageSize];Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(sourceData.Scan0, sourceBuffer, 0, imageSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Unlock source bitmapDi2015NewLine            source.UnlockBits(sourceData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create destination bitmapDi2015NewLine            var destination = new Bitmap(source.Width, source.Height, PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed);Di2015NewLine            destination.SetResolution(original.HorizontalResolution, original.VerticalResolution);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Lock destination bitmap in memoryDi2015NewLine            var destinationData = destination.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, destination.Width, destination.Height), ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create destination bufferDi2015NewLine            imageSize = destinationData.Stride * destinationData.Height;Di2015NewLine            var destinationBuffer = new byte[imageSize];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var sourceIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine            var destinationIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine            var pixelTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine            byte destinationValue = 0;Di2015NewLine            var pixelValue = 128;Di2015NewLine            var height = source.Height;Di2015NewLine            var width = source.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Iterate linesDi2015NewLine            for (var y = 0; y < height; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sourceIndex = y * sourceData.Stride;Di2015NewLine                destinationIndex = y * destinationData.Stride;Di2015NewLine                destinationValue = 0;Di2015NewLine                pixelValue = 128;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Iterate pixelsDi2015NewLine                for (var x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Compute pixel brightness (i.e. total of Red, Green, and Blue values) - Thanks murxDi2015NewLine                    //                           B                             G                              RDi2015NewLine                    pixelTotal = sourceBuffer[sourceIndex] + sourceBuffer[sourceIndex + 1] + sourceBuffer[sourceIndex + 2];Di2015NewLine                    if (pixelTotal > threshold)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        destinationValue += (byte)pixelValue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (pixelValue == 1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        destinationBuffer[destinationIndex] = destinationValue;Di2015NewLine                        destinationIndex++;Di2015NewLine                        destinationValue = 0;Di2015NewLine                        pixelValue = 128;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        pixelValue >>= 1;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    sourceIndex += 4;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (pixelValue != 128)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    destinationBuffer[destinationIndex] = destinationValue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Copy binary image data to destination bitmapDi2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(destinationBuffer, 0, destinationData.Scan0, imageSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Unlock destination bitmapDi2015NewLine            destination.UnlockBits(destinationData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Dispose of source if not originally supplied bitmapDi2015NewLine            if (source != original)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                source.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // ReturnDi2015NewLine            return destination;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

19555959Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplicationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [STAThreadAttribute]Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.Print("ApartmentState: {0}", Thread.CurrentThread.ApartmentState.ToString());Di2015NewLine            Debug.Print("*** Test 1 ***");Di2015NewLine            Test();Di2015NewLine            SynchronizationContext.SetSynchronizationContext(null);Di2015NewLine            WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.AutoInstall = false;Di2015NewLine            Debug.Print("*** Test 2 ***");Di2015NewLine            Test();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void DumpSyncContext(string id, string message, object ctx)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.Print("{0}: {1} ({2})", id, ctx != null ? ctx.GetType().Name : "null", message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Test()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.Print("WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.AutoInstall: {0}", WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.AutoInstall);Di2015NewLine            var ctx1 = SynchronizationContext.Current;Di2015NewLine            DumpSyncContext("ctx1", "before setting up the context", ctx1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!(ctx1 is WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext))Di2015NewLine                SynchronizationContext.SetSynchronizationContext(new WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var ctx2 = SynchronizationContext.Current;Di2015NewLine            DumpSyncContext("ctx2", "before Application.DoEvents", ctx2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Application.DoEvents();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var ctx3 = SynchronizationContext.Current;Di2015NewLine            DumpSyncContext("ctx3", "after Application.DoEvents", ctx3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Debug.Print("ctx3 == ctx1: {0}, ctx3 == ctx2: {1}", ctx3 == ctx1, ctx3 == ctx2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19555959Di2015UniqueSeparatorMsgWaitForMultipleObjects
19555959Di2015UniqueSeparator// wait for a handle while dispatching messages with Application.DoEventsDi2015NewLinepublic static bool WaitWithDoEvents(WaitHandle handle, int timeout)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var currentTimeout = timeout;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // track timeout if not infiniteDi2015NewLine    Func<bool> hasTimedOut = null;Di2015NewLine    if (timeout != Timeout.Infinite)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // can't use Environment.TickCount as it is int, problems with wrappingDi2015NewLine        uint startTick = Win32.GetTickCount();Di2015NewLine        hasTimedOut = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var lapse = (int)(unchecked(Win32.GetTickCount() - startTick));Di2015NewLine            currentTimeout = timeout - lapse;Di2015NewLine            return currentTimeout <= 0;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hasTimedOut = () => false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IntPtr[] handles = { handle.SafeWaitHandle.DangerousGetHandle() };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // process any pending messagesDi2015NewLine        while ((Win32.GetQueueStatus(Win32.QS_ALL) & Win32.QS_ALL) != 0) // low word is non-zero if input/message pendingDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (handle.WaitOne(0))Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            var autoInstall = System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.AutoInstall;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // http://goo.gl/V0mdYjDi2015NewLine                System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.AutoInstall = false;Di2015NewLine                System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.AutoInstall = autoInstall;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (hasTimedOut())Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // wait for either a message or the handleDi2015NewLine        var result = Win32.MsgWaitForMultipleObjects(1, handles, false, (uint)currentTimeout, Win32.QS_ALL);Di2015NewLine        if (result == Win32.WAIT_OBJECT_0)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        if (result == Win32.WAIT_TIMEOUT)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19555959Di2015UniqueSeparatorCoWaitForMultipleHandles
19555959Di2015UniqueSeparatorDoEvents
19555959Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// AwaitHelpers - custom awaitersDi2015NewLine/// WithContext continues on the control's thread after awaitDi2015NewLine/// E.g.: await TaskEx.Delay(1000).WithContext(this)Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class AwaitHelpersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static ContextAwaiter<T> WithContext<T>(this Task<T> task, Control control, bool alwaysAsync = false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ContextAwaiter<T>(task, control, alwaysAsync);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ContextAwaiter<T>Di2015NewLine    public class ContextAwaiter<T> : INotifyCompletionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        readonly Control _control;Di2015NewLine        readonly TaskAwaiter<T> _awaiter;Di2015NewLine        readonly bool _alwaysAsync;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ContextAwaiter(Task<T> task, Control control, bool alwaysAsync)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _awaiter = task.GetAwaiter();Di2015NewLine            _control = control;Di2015NewLine            _alwaysAsync = alwaysAsync;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ContextAwaiter<T> GetAwaiter() { return this; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsCompleted { get { return !_alwaysAsync && _awaiter.IsCompleted; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void OnCompleted(Action continuation)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_alwaysAsync || _control.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Action<Action> callback = (c) => _awaiter.OnCompleted(c);Di2015NewLine                _control.BeginInvoke(callback, continuation);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                _awaiter.OnCompleted(continuation);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T GetResult()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _awaiter.GetResult();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19556063Di2015UniqueSeparatortask.ContinueWith(HandleError, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnFaulted);Di2015NewLine

19558180Di2015UniqueSeparatorrecursiveOperation
19558180Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string RecursiveOperation(XmlNodeList xmlNodeList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (XmlNode currentNode in xmlNodeList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlNode clonedNode = currentNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remove try/finally block - if an exception is thrown yourDi2015NewLine        // result will be lost anywayDi2015NewLine        string interimMarkup = RecursiveOperation(currentNode.ChildNodes);Di2015NewLine        clonedNode.InnerXml = interimMarkup;Di2015NewLine        result.Append(Environment.NewLine)Di2015NewLine              .Append(clonedNode.OuterXml)Di2015NewLine              .Append(Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19559292Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach (string cmd in _commandList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (cmd.StartsWith("WAIT"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //ActionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    _comport.Write(cmd + (char)13);Di2015NewLine    int wait = 0;Di2015NewLine    var waitString=cmd.Substring(cmd.IndexOf('(') + 1, Di2015NewLine        cmd.IndexOf(')') - cmd.IndexOf('(') - 1);Di2015NewLine    if (Int32.TryParse(waitString, out wait))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(wait);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19559292Di2015UniqueSeparator// iterate through the commandsDi2015NewLineforeach (string cmd in _commandList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // check if the current command is WAITDi2015NewLine    if (cmd.StartsWith("WAIT"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        intDi2015NewLine            wait = 0, // the amount of milliseconds to sleepDi2015NewLine            startPosition = cmd.IndexOf('(') + 1,Di2015NewLine            length = cmd.IndexOf(')') - cmd.IndexOf('(') - 1;Di2015NewLine        // check if the length of the string between '(' and ')' is larger then 0Di2015NewLine        if (length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var waitString = cmd.Substring(startPosition, length);Di2015NewLine            // check if the string between '(' and ')' is an integerDi2015NewLine            if (Int32.TryParse(waitString, out wait))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // sleep for 'wait' millisecondsDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(wait);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // current command is not WAITDi2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // send it to the COM portDi2015NewLine        _comport.Write(cmd + (char)13);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19560621Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic uint SwapBytes(uint x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // swap adjacent 16-bit blocksDi2015NewLine    x = (x >> 16) | (x << 16);Di2015NewLine    // swap adjacent 8-bit blocksDi2015NewLine    return ((x & 0xFF00FF00) >> 8) | ((x & 0x00FF00FF) << 8);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19560621Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ulong SwapBytes(ulong x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // swap adjacent 32-bit blocksDi2015NewLine    x = (x >> 32) | (x << 32);Di2015NewLine    // swap adjacent 16-bit blocksDi2015NewLine    x = ((x & 0xFFFF0000FFFF0000) >> 16) | ((x & 0x0000FFFF0000FFFF) << 16);Di2015NewLine    // swap adjacent 8-bit blocksDi2015NewLine    return ((x & 0xFF00FF00FF00FF00) >> 8) | ((x & 0x00FF00FF00FF00FF) << 8);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19571104Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void RecursiveSearch(string root)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     string[] files = null;Di2015NewLine     string[] subDirs = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // First, process all the files directly under this folder Di2015NewLine     tryDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        files = Directory.EnumerateFiles(root).ToArray();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     catch (UnauthorizedAccessException e)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         logger.Add(e.Message);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     catch (System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException e)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if (files != null)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          DirectoryTree.Add(new DirectoryInfo(root), files.ToList());Di2015NewLine          subDirs = Directory.GetDirectories(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          foreach (string dir in subDirs)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine              RecursiveSearch(dir);Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19571699Di2015UniqueSeparator    [DllImport("user32")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr SetWindowsHookEx(int hookType, KeyboardLowLevelProc proc, IntPtr moduleHandle, int threadID);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern int UnhookWindowsHookEx(IntPtr hHook);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr CallNextHookEx(IntPtr hHook, int nCode, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr GetModuleHandle(string moduleName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public struct KBDLLHOOKSTRUCTDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Keys key;Di2015NewLine        public int scanCode;Di2015NewLine        public int flags;Di2015NewLine        public int time;Di2015NewLine        public IntPtr extra;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public delegate IntPtr KeyboardLowLevelProc(int hCode, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLine    public IntPtr KeyboardLowLevelCallback(int nCode, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (nCode >= 0) {Di2015NewLine            KBDLLHOOKSTRUCT kbd = (KBDLLHOOKSTRUCT)Marshal.PtrToStructure(lParam, typeof(KBDLLHOOKSTRUCT));Di2015NewLine            if (kbd.key == Keys.D0 && blockD0) {                Di2015NewLine                if(ModifierKeys == (Keys.Control | Keys.Shift)) {Di2015NewLine                    SendKeys.Send("{ESC}");Di2015NewLine                    //Add custom code as the response to Ctrl + Shift + D0 hereDi2015NewLine                    //....Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return new IntPtr(1);//Discard the default behaviorDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return CallNextHookEx(hHook, nCode, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    bool blockD0;Di2015NewLine    KeyboardLowLevelProc proc; //this should be declared in the form scopeDi2015NewLine    IntPtr hHook;Di2015NewLine    //your Form1 constructorDi2015NewLine    public Form1(){Di2015NewLine       InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine       //Get current module HandleDi2015NewLine       IntPtr currentModuleHandle = GetModuleHandle(System.Diagnostics.Process.GetCurrentProcess().MainModule.ModuleName);Di2015NewLine       //Set the keyboard hookDi2015NewLine       hHook = SetWindowsHookEx(13, proc, currentModuleHandle, 0);//WH_KEYBOARD_LL = 13Di2015NewLine       //register these Key events for your richTextBox1 Di2015NewLine       richTextBox1.KeyDown += (s, e) => {Di2015NewLine            if(e.KeyCode != Keys.D0) blockD0 = true;Di2015NewLine       };Di2015NewLine       richTextBox1.KeyUp += (s, e) => {Di2015NewLine            if (ModifierKeys == Keys.None) blockD0 = false;Di2015NewLine       };Di2015NewLine       //Unhook keyboard when form is closedDi2015NewLine       FormClosed += (s,e) => {Di2015NewLine          if (hHook != IntPtr.Zero) {Di2015NewLine              UnhookWindowsHookEx(hHook);Di2015NewLine              hHook = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19572660Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Randomize()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   int random = rand.Next(1,WIDTH);  Di2015NewLine   thisObstacle = new Obstacle(); //Blah, make your obstacle.Di2015NewLine   thisObstacle.rect = new Rectangle(random, Y,WIDTH, HEIGHT);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   foreach (Obstacle obstacle in obstacles)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine        //If less than 100 pixels distance, make the obstacle somewhere elseDi2015NewLine        if (GetDistance(thisObstacle.rect, obstacle.rect) < 100)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             Randomize();Di2015NewLine             return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   //If we didn't get near an obstacle, place itDi2015NewLine        //Do whatever you doDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static double GetDistance(Rectangle point1, Rectangle point2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     //Get distance by using the pythagorean theoremDi2015NewLine     double a = (double)(point2.X - point1.X);Di2015NewLine     double b = (double)(point2.Y - point1.Y);Di2015NewLine     return Math.Sqrt(a * a + b * b);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19576290Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Subsequencise<T>(this IEnumerable<T> input, int subsequenceLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var syncObj = new object();Di2015NewLine    var enumerator = input.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<T> currentList = new List<T> { enumerator.Current };Di2015NewLine    int length = 1;Di2015NewLine    while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (length == subsequenceLength)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            length = 0;Di2015NewLine            yield return currentList;Di2015NewLine            currentList = new List<T>();                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        currentList.Add(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine        ++length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    yield return currentList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19576371Di2015UniqueSeparator#region Multi-Results Set GridReaderDi2015NewLinepublic class GridReader : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IDataReader _reader;Di2015NewLine    private GridReader(Database database, IDbCommand command, IDataReader reader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _db = database;Di2015NewLine        _command = command;Di2015NewLine        _reader = reader;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region public Read<T> methodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Reads from a GridReader, returning the results as
