(T1), typeof (T2), typeof (T3), typeof (T4)}, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Perform a multi-poco queryDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T1">The first POCO type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T2">The second POCO type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TRet">The type of objects in the returned IEnumerable</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="cb">A callback function to connect the POCO instances, or null to automatically guess the relationships</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A collection of POCO's as an IEnumerable</returns>Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<TRet> Read<T1, T2, TRet>(Func<T1, T2, TRet> cb)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return MultiPocoFromIDataReader<TRet>(_gridIndex, new Type[] {typeof (T1), typeof (T2)}, cb);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Perform a multi-poco queryDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T1">The first POCO type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T2">The second POCO type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam IEnumerable<TRet> Read<T1, T2, T3, TRet>(Func<T1, T2, T3, TRet> cb)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return MultiPocoFromIDataReader<TRet>(_gridIndex, new Type[] {typeof (T1), typeof (T2), typeof (T3)}, cb);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Perform a multi-poco queryDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T1">The first POCO IEnumerable<TRet> Read<T1, T2, T3, T4, TRet>(Func<T1, T2, T3, T4, TRet> cb)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return MultiPocoFromIDataReader<TRet>(_gridIndex,Di2015NewLine                                              new Type[] {typeof (T1), typeof (T2), typeof (T3), typeof (T4)}, cb);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region PocoFromIDataReaderDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Read data to a single pocoDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The type representing a row in the result set</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="index">Reader row to be read from the underlying IDataReader</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<T> SinglePocoFromIDataReader<T>(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_reader == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ObjectDisposedException(GetType().FullName, "The data reader has been disposed");Di2015NewLine        if (_consumed)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine                "Query results must be consumed in the correct order, and each result can only be consumed once");Di2015NewLine        _consumed = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var pd = PocoData.ForType(typeof (T));Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (index == _gridIndex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var factory =Di2015NewLine                    pd.GetFactory(_command.CommandText, _command.Connection.ConnectionString, 0, _reader.FieldCount,Di2015NewLine                                  _reader) as Func<IDataReader, T>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    T poco;Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (!_reader.Read())Di2015NewLine                            yield break;Di2015NewLine                        poco = factory(_reader);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (Exception x)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (_db.OnException(x))Di2015NewLine                            throw;Di2015NewLine                        yield break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    yield return poco;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finally // finally so that First etc progresses things even when multiple rowsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (index == _gridIndex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                NextResult();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Read data to multiple pocosDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TRet">The type of objects in the returned IEnumerable</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="index">Reader row to be read from the underlying IDataReader</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="types">An array of Types representing the POCO types of the returned result set.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="cb">A callback function to connect the POCO instances, or null to automatically guess the relationships</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A collection of POCO's as an IEnumerable</returns>Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<TRet> MultiPocoFromIDataReader<TRet>(int index, Type[] types, object cb)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_reader == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ObjectDisposedException(GetType().FullName, "The data reader has been disposed");Di2015NewLine        if (_consumed)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine                "Query results must be consumed in the correct order, and each result can only be consumed once");Di2015NewLine        _consumed = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var cmd = _command;Di2015NewLine            var r = _reader;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var factory = MultiPocoFactory.GetFactory<TRet>(types, cmd.Connection.ConnectionString, cmd.CommandText,Di2015NewLine                                                            r);Di2015NewLine            if (cb == null)Di2015NewLine                cb = MultiPocoFactory.GetAutoMapper(types.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            bool bNeedTerminator = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TRet poco;Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!r.Read())Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    poco = factory(r, cb);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception x)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (_db.OnException(x))Di2015NewLine                        throw;Di2015NewLine                    yield break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (poco != null)Di2015NewLine                    yield return poco;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    bNeedTerminator = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (bNeedTerminator)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var poco = (TRet) (cb as Delegate).DynamicInvoke(new object[types.Length]);Di2015NewLine                if (poco != null)Di2015NewLine                    yield return poco;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    yield break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (index == _gridIndex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                NextResult();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region DataReader ManagementDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int _gridIndex;Di2015NewLine    private bool _consumed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Advance the IDataReader to the NextResult, if availableDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private void NextResult()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_reader.NextResult()) return;Di2015NewLine        _gridIndex++;Di2015NewLine        _consumed = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Dispose the grid, closing and disposing both the underlying reader, command and shared connectionDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_reader != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_reader.IsClosed && _command != null) _command.Cancel();Di2015NewLine            _reader.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            _reader = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_command != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _command.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            _command = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _db.CloseSharedConnection();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLine
